ssw: sive sitawukhumbula kutsi ngesikhatsi senkhulumo leyetfulelwa sive nga-2009, ngimemetele kutsi luhlelo lwekwandzisa imisebenti yemphakatsi lutawusungula ematfuba emisebenti langu-500 000 ngengongoni 2009. lawa ngematfuba emisebenti lasungulwe kute anikete bantfu labangasebenti liholo, lwati lwemsebenti kanye nematfuba ekuceceshwa.
xho: isizwe siyakukhumbula ukuba kwintetho kamongameli engobume besizwe yowama-2009, ndabhengeza ukuba inkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatyisiweyo iza kudala amathuba emisebenzi engama-500 000 kweyomnga 2009. la ngamathuba emisebenzi adalelwe ukubonelela abantu abangaphangeliyo ngomvuzo, amava omsebenzi namathuba oqeqesho.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,kuyintfokoto kumemetela kutsi ekupheleni kwengongoni, besesisungule ematfuba emisebenti yemmango lengu-480 00, lokungemaphesenti langema-97% elinani lesitibekele lona.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,bemi bomzantsi afrika, sinovuyo ukunazisa ukuba ekupheleni kweyomnga, besesidale amathuba emisebenzi yoluntu engaphezulu kwama-480 000, into ethetha ukuthi ngama-97% yenani ebesijolise kulo.

ssw: lemisebenti isemikhakheni yekwakha, kunakekela bantfu emakhaya nasemmangweni, kanye nemiklamo yetemvelo.
xho: le yimisebenzi efana neyokwakha, unakekelo lwezempilo lwasekhaya nolwasekuhlaleni, neeprojekti zokusingqongileyo.

ssw: sibone letinye tindzawo lesingenta ncono kuto, letitawukhomba kuchubekela embili, kufaka ekhatsi kucinisekisa imiklamo lebukene netisebenti.
xho: sityumbe imimandla ethile efuna ukuphuculwa, esiza kuyisebenzisa ukuya phambili, kuquka nokuqinisekisa ngeeprojekti ezijolise kakhulu ekusekweni kwemisebenzi.

ssw: siyati kutsi leti naletinye tindlela tanciphisa ngalokuphelele imitselela yekufadalala kwemnotfo.
xho: siyayazi ukuba oku namanye amanyathelo akusoze kuyinciphise ngokupheleleyo impembelelo yokudodobala koqoqosho.

ssw: siyabonga ngemoya wekusebenta kwemndeni, kwemmango nekutitsandzela lokhutsata bantfu labanyenti kutsi basite labo labakhungetfwe nguletiyaluyalu tetemnotfo, ngaletikhatsi letimatima.
xho: siyawubulela umoya weentsapho, wobuhlali nomsebenzi wamavolontiya ovuselela abantu abaninizi ukuba bancede abo bachatshazelwe kakhulu yile ntlekele, ngala maxesha obunzima.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,tinkhomba tetemnotfo tikhomba kutsi sesigucule simo nyalo.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,iimpawu zoqoqosho zibonisa ukuba ngoku sesidlulile kwelona xesha linzima.

ssw: umnyakato wetemnotfo uyenyuka eningizimu afrika, kantsi silindzele kukhula lokuya embili.
xho: uqoqosho luyakhula emzantsi afrika, kwaye silindele ukukhula koqoqosho okuya phambili.

ssw: tibalo tetisebenti letikhishwe ngelesibili, tikhombisa kutsi nyalo umnotfo sewusungule ematfuba emisebenti kunekutsi ilahleke.
xho: iinkcukacha-manani zezemisebenzi ezikhutshwe ngolwesibini, zibonakalisa ukuba uqoqosho ludala amathuba emisebenzi kunokuba luyivale.

ssw: nanobe kunjalo, kusesemasinya kakhulu kucinisekisa litubane lekubuyela esimeni sangembili.
xho: kodwa ke, kuse kutsha noko, ukuba singaqiniseka ngezinga lokuphucuka.

ssw: ngako hulumende ngete atihocisa tindlela takhe tekwesekela.
xho: ngoko ke, urhulumente akakazukuyirhoxisa inkxaso yakhe.

ssw: nyalo sesikhatsi sekubeka sisekelo sekukhula lokucinile lokuya embili, kanye nekukhula lokuletsa imisebenti leminyenti.
xho: ngoku lixesha lokuba sakhe isiseko sokukhula koqoqosho olomeleleyo ukuya phambili, nokukhula okuvelisa amathuba emisebenzi eyongezelelweyo.

ssw: tinhlelo tesakhiwonchanti setfu sesikhatsi lesidze titasisita kutsi sikhule ngekunonopha.
xho: inkqubo yethu yeziseko zoncedo yexesha elide iza kusinceda sikhule ngoku khawuleza.

ssw: tinhlelo tetfu tetemfundvo netemakhono titakwandzisa kukhicita kanye nekuncintsisana kwetfu.
xho: iinkqubo zethu zezemfundo nezakhono ziza kwandisa ukuvelisa kwethu nokukhuphisana.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwenchubomgomo lesebenta kutetimboni nekugcila kwetfu lokusha emisebentini lephelele, kutakwakha timboni leticinile naletemukela tisebenti letinyenti.
xho: isicwangciso sokusebenza komgaqo-nkqubo wezoshishino wethu nengqwalasela yethu entsha kwimisebenzi efanelekileyo ngokusingqongileyo, siyakwakha ushishino olomelele ngokuthe chatha noluqesha abantu abaninzi.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya titakwenta ngcono umkhicito wasemakhaya, kanye netemphilo tebantfu labahlala etindzaweni tasemakhaya.
xho: inkqubo yethu yophuhliso lwamaphandle iya kuphucula imveliso yasemaphandleni, kwakunye nobomi babantu abahlala emaphandleni.

ssw: lokwesekela lisu letfu lekubuyisela umnotfo esimeni lesetayelekile nasekukhuliseni, luhlelo lwetfu lwekusisa ngetimali.
xho: isiseko sesicwangciso-qhinga sethu sokubuyisela uqoqosho nokukhula, inkqubo yethu yotyalo-mali lwemali eyinkunzi.

ssw: kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako, hulumende utawuchitsa imali lengemabhiliyoni emarandi langu-846 kusakhiwonchanti semmango.
xho: kule minyaka mithathu izayo, urhulumente uza kuchitha ama-r846 eebhiliyoni kwiziseko zoncedo zoluntu.

ssw: kutekutfutsa, sitawugcina siphindze senabise umsebenti wetfu wekuchumanisa tindzawo ngemigwaco.
xho: kwezothutho, siza kulolonga sandise uthungelwano lwethu leendlela.

ssw: sitawucinisekisa kutsi kuchumanisa kwetfu kwetindzawo ngaloliwe kuyetsembeka, futsi kuhlanganiswe kancono nemachweba etfu.
xho: siza kuqinisekisa ukuba uthungelwano lwethu lomzila kaloliwe luthembakele, luyakhuphisana kwaye ludityaniswe ngendlela engcono namazibuko wethu.

ssw: kute kucinisekiswe kuniketwa kwemandla agezi, sisungule likomiti letindvuna lelibukene netemandla, kute kwentiwe luhlelo loluhlanganisile lweminyaka lengama-20.
xho: ukuqinisekisa unikezelo mbane oluthembakeleyo, siye saseka ikomiti yabaphathiswa kwezamandla, ukuze baphuhlise isicwangciso semithombo esidibeneyo seminyaka engama-20.

ssw: phakatsi kwaletinye tintfo, loku kutawubuka ekutibandzakanyeni kwebakhiciti bemandla labatimele, nasekuvikeleni labaphuyile ekwenyukeni kwemanani agezi.
xho: phakathi kwezinye izinto, oku kuya kujonga ekuthatheni inxaxheba kwabavelisi bombane abazimeleyo, nokukhusela abantu abahluphekileyo kumaxabiso ombane onyukayo.

ssw: sitawusungula luhlelo lwekusebenta ngagezi lolutimele, lolwehlukile ku-eskom holdings.
xho: siza kuseka ulawulo lwenkqubo ezimeleyo, eyahlukileyo ku-eskom holdings.

ssw: eskom utawuchubeka nekwakha lamanye emandla ekukhicita emandla agezi aphindze ente ncono simo setiteshi takhe tagezi.
xho: u-eskom uza kuqhubekeka ukwakha amandla okuvelisa aze aphucule indlela yokulolonga izikhululo zakhe.

ssw: kucinisekisa kukhuliswa kwemnotfo lohlanganisako, kute sisite kukhula nentfutfuko, sisungule umkhandlu loweluleka ngeluhlelo lolwenabile lwekuniketa labamnyama emandla kutemnotfo, loluholwa ngumengameli.
xho: ukuqinisekisa ukukhuthaza uqoqosho oluquka wonke umntu, ukuncedisa nokuphuhlisa, siye saseka ibhunga lokucebisa lokuxhotyiswa kwabamnyama ngokubanzi kwezoqoqosho, usihlalo walo ngumongameli.

ssw: kugcila kwetfu lokukhulu ekuguculeni inchubomgomo kumele kube kungenela ekusunguleni imisebenti yebantfu labasha.
xho: eyona ngqwalasela intsha ingxamisekileyo lutshintsho lomgaqo-nkqubo ekufuneka ibe ngamangenelelo okudala amathuba emisebenzi yabantu abatsha.

ssw: emazinga ekungasebenti kwebantfu labasha angetulu kakhulu kunelizinga lelilingene.
xho: izinga lokungaphangeli kwabantu abatsha lingaphezu kokuqonda.

ssw: tiphakamiso titawubekwa kute kusitwe ngetimali etindlekweni tekucasha tisebenti talabasha, kute kukhutsatwe emafemu kutsi atsatse tisebenti letite lwati lwemsebenti lolwenele.
xho: kuza kwenziwa iziphakamiso zokuncedisa kwiindleko zokuqeshwa kwabasebenzi abasebatsha, ukukhuthaza iifemu ukuba ziqeshe abasebenzi abangenamava.

ssw: lokunye kwelulwa kwetinhlelo temisebenti yemmango nako kuyachutjwa.
xho: okunye ukwandiswa kwenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu nako kusendleleni.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi sakhiwonchanti ezingeni lasekhaya nemiklamo lemikhulu kanye nemiklamo yekukwati kufundza nekubhala, kunakekela kwasemakhaya, kugcinwa kwetikolo kanye nemitamo yekukhulisa bantfwana labasebancane.
xho: oku kuquka iziseko zoncedo zasekhaya neeprojekti zamaziko emfundo ephakamileyo neeprojekti zezakhono zokufunda nokubhala, unakekelo lwezempilo lasekhaya, ukunakekelwa kwezikolo namaphulo okuphuhliswa kwabantwana abasakhulayo.

ssw: kulomnyaka lowengcile sisukumise sikhungo sekutfutfukisa lusha lwavelonkhe.
xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo siseke i-arhente yophuhliso lolutsha yesizwe.

ssw: siyalele loluphiko kutsi lusungule imitimba yalo, eliveni lonkhe, kute lutewukwati kusita ekucondziseni tinhlelo tekutfutfukisa ngekhatsi kuhulumende.
xho: siyalele ukuba le arhente mayisebenze ngokukhawuleza ukuseka iziseko zayo, elizweni jikelele, ukuze ibe nokuncedisa ukufaka iinkqubo zophuhliso lolutsha eburhulumenteni.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,ngalesikhatsi baphatsi bacala kuphatsa emnyakeni lowengcile, sitsembise kusebenta ngemandla kute sakhe umbuso lotfutfuke ngemandla.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,ekungeneni kolu lawulo kulo nyaka uphelileyo, saqalisa ukusebenza ngamandla ukwakha isizwe esiphuhlayo.

ssw: sitsite kutakuba ngumbuso lophendvula etidzingweni nasetifisweni tebantfu, nalosebenta kancono nangekunonopha.
xho: sathi iya kuba sisizwe esihoyana neemfuno neminqweno yabantu, esisebenza ngcono nangokukhawuleza.

ssw: lomnyaka, wa-2010, kutakuba ngumnyaka wekwenta.
xho: lo nyaka, wama-2010, uza kuba ngunyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe.

ssw: luphawu loluchaza lokuphatsa kutakuba ngulolo lwekutsi kuyati lapho bantfu bahlala khona, kuvisisa tidzingo tabo futsi kuphendvula ngekunonopha.
xho: olona phawu lubalulekileyo kolu lawulo iza kuba kukuba luyabazi abantu ukuba bahlala phi na, luyaziqonda iimfuno zabo kwaye lusabela ngokukhawuleza.

ssw: hulumende kumele asebente ngekunonopha, ngemandla nangekuhlakanipha.
xho: urhulumente kufuneka asebenze ngokukhawuleza, ngamandla nangcono.

ssw: sitawulindzela sigungu lesiphetse kanye nemsebenti wahulumende kutsi bahambisane nalombono.
xho: siza kulindela ukuba iinkonzo zesigqeba nezoluntu ukuba ziwuthobele lo mbono.

ssw: sakha umbuso logcile ekusebenteni, ngekwenta ncono kuhlela kanye netinhlelo tekulandzelela kusebenta nekulinganisa.
xho: sakha isizwe esisekelezelwe ekwenziweni komsebenzi, ngokuphucula ucwangciso kwakunye nohlolo novavanyo lomsebenzi.

ssw: kumele futsi sihlanganise tindlela tekulinganisa kutebulili eluhlelweni lwahulumende lwekwenta.
xho: sikwafuna ukuquka amanyathelo okulingana ngokwesini kwinkqubo yomsebenzi karhulumente.

ssw: loluhlelo lwekwenta lutawucinisekisa kutsi bomake, bantfwana nebantfu labakhubatekile bakwati kufinyelela kumatfuba ekutitfutfukisa.
xho: la manyathelo ayakuqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo, abantwana nabantu abakhubazekileyo bayakwazi ukufikelela kumathuba ophuhliso.

ssw: sinentfokoto yekumemetela indlela lensha yekwenta tintfo kuhulumende.
xho: sinovuyo ukwazisa ngendlela entsha yokusebenza kurhulumente.

ssw: umsebenti wematiko utawukalwa ngemiphumela, letfutfukiswe ngeluhlelo lwetfu lwekulandzelela kusebenta nekulinganisa.
xho: imisebenzi yamasebe iya kulinganiswa ngemiphumela, ephuhliswe ngenkqubo yethu yohlolo novavanyo lomsebenzi.

ssw: tindvuna letibukene nemphumela lotsite, titawusayina namengameli sivumelwano lesichaza ngalokubanti ngekusebenta kwato.
xho: abaphathiswa abajongene nemiphumela ethile, baya kutyikitya isivumelwano sokwenziwa komsebenzi esicwangcisiweyo kumongameli.

ssw: lesivumelwano sitawuchaza kutsi yini lokumele yentiwe, kanjani, ngubani, esikhatsini lesinganani nekutsi ngutiphi tindlela tekukala kanye netinsita letitawusetjentiswa.
xho: siza kucacisa ukuba yintoni ekufanele yenziwe, njani, ngubani, phakathi kwexesha elingakanani na kwaye kusetyenziswa wuphi umlinganiselo nayiphi imithombo.

ssw: njengobe nati, sitibophetele etintfweni letisihlanu letisetulu eluhlwini: imfundvo, temphilo, kutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya, kusungula imisebenti lemihle kanye nekulwa nebugebengu.
xho: njengoko nisazi, sizibophelele kwiindawo zantlanu eziphambili emakuqalwe ngazo: ezemfundo, ezempilo, uphuhliso lwamaphandle novuselelo lomhlaba, ukudala umsebenzi ofanelekileyo, nokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho.

ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, sitawusebentela kwenta ncono kusebenta kahle kwahulumende wasemakhaya, kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti kanye nekuhlaliswa kwebantfu.
xho: ukongeza, siza kusebenzela ukuphucula ukusebenza koorhulumente basekhaya, uphuhliso lweziseko zoncedo neendawo zokuhlala koluntu.

ssw: sitsembisa kwenta iminyakato leyinsika lelibangise ekutfolweni kwalemiphumela.
xho: siza kwenza imisebenzi emininzi engundoqo ukujolisa ekuphumezeni le miphumela.

ssw: sibeke imfundvo nekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono enkhabeni yetinchubomgomo talohulumende.
xho: ingqwalasela yethu enkulu siyibeke kwezemfundo nasekuphuhlisweni kwezakhono kwimigaqo-nkqubo yalo rhulumente.

ssw: eluhlelweni lwetfu lwa-2010, sifuna kwenta ncono likhono lebantfwana betfu lekukwati kufundza, kubhala nekubala eminyakeni lesisekelo.
xho: kwinkqubo yethu yama-2010, sifuna ukuphucula amandla abantwana bethu okufunda, ukubhala nokubala kwakwiminyaka yabo yokuqala.

ssw: ngaphandle kwekwenta loku, singete sakwati kwenta ncono lizinga lemfundvo.
xho: asisokuze siwuphucule umgangatho wemfundo, ngaphandle kokuba senze oku.

ssw: tibalo temfundvo lesitibekele tona timalula kodvwa tinebungoti.
xho: iinjongo zethu eziphambili kwezemfundo zilula kodwa zibalulekile.

ssw: sifuna bafundzi nemathishela babe sesikolweni, eklasini, ngesikhatsi, bafundza futsi bafundzisa ema-awa lasikhombisa ngelusuku.
xho: sifuna ukuba abafundi kunye nootitshala babe sesikolweni, emagumbini okufundela, ngexesha, bafunde kwaye bafundise iiyure ezisixhenxe ngosuku.

ssw: sitawusita bothishela ngekubanikela luhlelo lwetifundvo lwemalanga onkhe loluchaza kabanti.
xho: siza kuncedisa ootitshala ngokubabonelela ngezicwangciso zemihla ngemihla zezifundo ezineenkcukacha.

ssw: kubafundzi, sitawuniketela ngetincwadzi temsebenti lokumalula kutisebentisa letibhalwe ngato tonkhe tilwimi letili-11.
xho: abafundi, siyakuba bonelela ngeencwadi zokusebenzela ekulula ukuzisebenzisa ezifumaneka ngeelwimi ezili-11.

ssw: kusukela kulomnyaka kuya embili, onkhe emabanga lesi-3, 6 nele-9 batawubhala tivivinyo tekukwati kubhala nekubala kanye netenyumeresi lokutivivinyo letitawenganyelwa ngalokutimele.
xho: ukusukela kulo nyaka ukuya phambili, bonke abafundi bebanga le-3, le-6 nele-9 baya kubhala uvavanyo lokufunda nokubhala nolwezibalo oluphononongwe ngokuzimeleyo.

ssw: sihlose kwenyusa lizinga lekuphumelela laletivivinyo kwanyalo lelisemkhatsini kwama-35 na-40% kuyewufinyelela lokungenani kuma-60% nga-2014.
xho: sizimisele ukwandisa izinga lempumelelo kolu vavanyo lisuke kwizinga lomlinganiso ophakathi wangoku ophakathi kwama-35 nama-40% ukuya kuma-60% ngowama-2014 ubuncinane.

ssw: imiphumela itawutfunyelwa kubatali kute balandzelele inchubekelembili.
xho: iziphumo ziya kuthunyelwa kubazali ukuze bakwazi ukubona inkqubela.

ssw: ngetulu kwaloko, ngasinye setikolo tetfu letingu-27 000 sitawuhlolwa tikhulu telitiko lemfundvo lesisekelo.
xho: ukongeza apho, isikolo ngasinye kwizikolo zethu ezingama-27 000 ziya kuhlolwa ngamagosa esebe lemfundo esisiseko.

ssw: loku kutawurekhodwa embikweni lobhaliwe locwaningekako.
xho: oku kuya kushicelelwa kwingxelo ebhaliweyo ezakuphicothwa.

ssw: sihlose kwenyusa linani lebafundzi bamatikuletjeni labakhona kwemukelwa emanyuvesi kutsi lifinyelele ku-175 000 ngemnyaka nga-2014.
xho: sizimisele ukulandisa inani labafundi bematriki abalungele ukungena eyunivesithi liyokuma kwi-175 000 ngonyaka ngowama-2014.

ssw: sicela kutsi batali babambisane natsi ekwenteni loku kube yimphumelelo.
xho: sicela abazali ukuba basebenzisane kunye nathi ekwenzeni oku kube yimpumelelo.

ssw: semukela sitatimende semnyaka lowengcile lesakhishwa tinhlangano temathishela letintsatfu, naptosa, sadtu ne-saou, sekucinisa futsi nekutibophetela kwabo emkhankasweni wekufundza nekufundzisa lokusezingeni leliphakeme kusukela ekucaleni kwa-2010.
xho: siyayamkela intetho eyenziwe yimibutho yootitshala, i-naptosa, sadtu ne-saou, xa bengqina ukuzibophelela kwabo kwiphulo lokufunda nokufundisa okusemgangathweni ukususela ekuqaleni kowama-2010.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,kumele sisise kulusha lwetfu kute sicinisekise kutsi sinetisebenti letinemakhono naletikwatiko kusebenta kute kwesekelwe kukhula nekusungulwa kwemisebenti.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,kufanele sidale ihlumelo kulutsha lwethu ukuqinisekisa abasebenzi abanezakhono nabakwaziyo ukusebenza ukuxhasa ukukhula nokudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi.

ssw: ngaloko sihlela kwandzisa kuceceshwa kwalabaneminyaka yebudzala lengu-16-25 etikhungweni temfundvo nekucecesha.
xho: ngako oko siceba ukwandisa uqeqesho lwababudala buphakathi kwe-16 ?

ssw: loku kutasenta sikwati kuniketa imfundvo litfuba lesibili, kulabo labangakulungeli kuya emanyuvesi.
xho: oku kuza kusivumela ukuba sinike abo bangakulungelanga ukungena eyunivesiti ngokwemfundo, ithuba lesibini kwimfundo.

ssw: sisebentisana netikhungo temfundvo lephakeme kute kucinisekiswe kutsi bafundzi labakulungele batfola lusito lwetimali, ngeluhlelo lwavelonkhe lwekusita bafundzi ngetimali.
xho: sisebenzisana namaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi abafanelekileyo bafumana uncedo lwemali, ngesikimu soncedo lwezezimali lwabafundi sesizwe.

ssw: siphindze satibekela emanani ekutfutfukiswa kwemakhono, kute kukhicitwe labanye bonjiniyela nabochwepheshe, kuphindze kwenyuswe linani labothishela labakufanele kufundzisa tibalo nesayensi.
xho: kwakhona sizibekele ngebhongo iinjongo eziphambili zophuhliso lwezakhono, ukuvelisa iinjineli namagcisa ongezelelweyo, nokwandisa inani lootitshala abalungele ukufundisa izibalo nenzululwazi.

ssw: kumele futsi senyuse linani lalabasha labangenela tinhlelo tekufundza ngemisebenti emikhakheni letimele nasemkhakheni wahulumende.
xho: kufuneka sandise inani lolutsha olungenela uqeqesho emisebenzini kumacandelo abucala nawakarhulumente.

ssw: lomunye umphumela lobalulekile kucinisekisa imphilo lendze nalekahle yato tonkhe takhamiti teleningizimu afrika.
xho: omnye umphumela ongundoqo kukuqinisekisa ubomi obude nobusempilweni kubo bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekwenta ncono luhlelo lwetfu lwetemphilo.
xho: siza kuqhubekeka ukuphucula inkqubo yethu yonakekelo lwezempilo.

ssw: loku kufaka ekhatsi kulungisa tibhedlela nemitfolamphilo, kanye nekwenta ncono timo tekusebenta tetisebenti tetemphilo.
xho: oku kuquka ukwakhiwa nokuphuculwa kwezibhedlele neekliniki, nokuqhubekeka ukuphucula iimeko abasebenza phantsi kwazo abasebenzi bonakekelo lwezempilo.

ssw: sibambisene nelibhange lekutfutfukisa le-afrika leseningizimu kute kwentiwe ncono kusebenta kwetibhedlela temmango kanye nemahhovisi ato etifundza.
xho: sizidibanise nebhanki yophuhliso yasemazantsi e-afrika ukuphucula iindlela ezisebenza ngayo izibhedlele zikarhulumente kunye nee-ofisi zazo zesithili.

ssw: siphindze sisebentisane nelibhange lekutfutfukisa le-afrika leseningizimu kanye nenhlangano letfutfukisa timboni, eluhlelweni lwebudlelwane kuhulumende nalabatimele kute kwentiwe ncono tibhedlela kanye nekusita imiklamo ngetimali.
xho: kwakhona sikwasebenzisana nebhanki yophuhliso yasemazantsi e-afrika kunye nequmrhu lophuhliso lwamashishini, kwinkqubo yobehlulelani bukarhulumente nabezoshishino labucala ukuphucula izibhedlele nokubonelela iiprojekthi ngemali.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,kumele sibukane nekutsi umjikeleto wemphilo kusukela esikhatsini sekutalwa, wehle kusukela eminyakeni lengama-60 nga-1994 kuye wufinyelela ngephansi kweminyaka lengama-50 lamuhla.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,kufuneka sihoyane nento yokuba ukuba ubomi obuphilwayo ukusukela ekuzalweni komntu, kwehlile ukusuka kwiminyaka engama-60 ngowe-1994 kwayo kutsho njengaphantsi kwama-50 eminyaka namhlanje.

ssw: ngako siyangenelela ngenhloso yekunciphisa emazinga ekufa kwebantfwana lababelekwako, kute kuncishiswe kwesuleleka ngesandvulelangculazi lokusha kanye nekwelashwa kwesandvulelangculazi nesifo sesifuba ngalokuyimphumelelo.
xho: ngoko ke senza amangenelela okunciphisa izinga lokubhubha kwabantwana abazalwayo, ukunciphisa usuleleko olutsha lwentsholongwane kagawulayo kwakunye nokunyanga ngokuvakalayo intsholongwane kagawulayo nesifo sephepha.

ssw: sitawuphindze sinciphise kufa kwetinswane ngeluhlelo lwekugonywa kwetinswane letinyenti.
xho: kwakhona siza kunciphisa ukubhubha kweentsana ngenkqubo yokugonya ngokobuninzi.

ssw: sitawubuyisela tinhlelo tetemphilo etikolweni.
xho: siza kubuyisela iinkqubo zezempilo ezikolweni.

ssw: sitakwenta tonkhe tetsembiso lesatenta ngelusuku lwengculazi lwemhlabawonkhe letimayelana netindlela letinsha tekuvikela nekwelapha sandvulelangculazi.
xho: siza kuphumeza zonke izivumelwano ezenziwa ngomhla kagawulayo wehlabathi ngokumalunga nothintelo olutsha lwentsholongwane kagawulayo namanyathelo onyango.

ssw: umsebenti uyachubeka kute kucinisekiswe kutsi umsebenti uhambisana nesikhatsi lesibekiwe.
xho: umsebenzi omkhulu uyenziwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba lo msebenzi ugqitywa ngexesha elifanelekileyo.

ssw: sitawuphindze sichubeke nemalungiselelo ekusungula luhlelo lwemshwalense wetemphilo velonkhe.
xho: kwakhona siza kuqhubekeka ngamalungiselelo okusekwa kwenkqubo ye-inshorensi yesizwe yezempilo.

ssw: takhamiti taseningizimu afrika,sisebenta kamatima kucinisekisa kutsi wonkhe umuntfu eningizimu afrika utiva aphephile kanye nekutsi kuphephile.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,senza konke okusemandleni wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke ubani emzantsi afrika uziva ekhuselekile kwaye ukhuselekile.

ssw: sitawuchubekisela embili umsebenti wetfu wekunciphisa bugebengu lobukhulu nalobuneludlame, siphindze sicinisekise kutsi luhlelo lwetebulungiswa lusebenta kahle.
xho: siza kuwuqhubela phambili umsebenzi wethu ukuciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho olumasikizi nolunobundlongondlongo, nokuqinisekisa ukuba inkqubo yezobulungisa isebenza ngokuvakalayo.

ssw: setfula tinhlelo tekwenyusa linani lemaphoyisa ngemaphesenti lalishumi kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako.
xho: siphumeza izicwangciso zokwandisa inani lamapolisa namapolisakazi nge-10% kule minyaka mithathu ilandelayo.

ssw: sikhombe kulwa nekutsatselwa timoto, kwebelwa kwemabhizimisi netindlu, kanye nebugebengu lobenteka ngekutsintsana lobunjengekubulala, kuhlukumeta ngekwelucansi kanye nekushaya, njengetintfo letisetulu eluhlwini lwetintfo letibalulekile.
xho: sityumbe ukulwana nokuqweqwediswa, ukukhuthuza kwasekhaya nokwamashishini, kwakunye nolwaphulo-mthetho oluphakathi komntu nomtu olufana nobugebenga, ukudlwengula nokuhlasela, njengeendawo eziphambili ekufanele kuqalwe ngazo.

ssw: sonkhe sinendzima lokumele siyidlale.
xho: sonke sinendima ekufanele siyidlalile.

ssw: asitibandzakanye netinkhundla temmango letibukene nekuphepha.
xho: masithathe inxaxheba kumaqonga okhuseleko nabahlali.

ssw: asesiyekele kutsenga timphahla letintjontjiwe.
xho: masiyeke ukuthenga izinto ezibiweyo.

ssw: asilungele kuniketa emaphoyisa lwati lolumayelana netento tebugebengu.
xho: masisoloko sikulungele ukunika amapolisa ulwazi malunga nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho.

ssw: ngekusebentisana sitabehlula bugebengu.
xho: xa sisebenzisana siya kuloyisa ulwaphulo-mthetho.

ssw: bakitsi netivakashi letihloniphekile,bohulumende basekhaya kumele basebente.
xho: bantu bakuthi neendwendwe ezibalulekileyo,oorhulumente basekhaya kufuneka basebenze.

ssw: bomasipala kumele bente ncono kuniketelwa kwetindlu, emanti, tekuhanjiswa kwemangcoliso, gezi, kutfutfwa kwetibi kanye nemigwaco.
xho: oomaspala kufuneka baphucule ubonelelo ngezindlu, amanzi, ugutyulo, umbane, ulawulo lwenkunkuma neendlela.

ssw: sibambe umhlangano nabosodolobha kanye nebaphatsi babomasipala emnyakeni lowengcile.
xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo besinentlanganiso noosodolophu nabaphathi boomaspala.

ssw: loku kunikete litfuba lekubona tintfo letingabonakali ngetincabhayi lebanato bohulumende basekhaya.
xho: oku kusinike umfanekiso wemiceli mingeni oorhulumente basekhaya abajongene nayo.

ssw: siphindze savakashela imimango nabomasipala labehlukehlukene, kufaka ekhatsi ibalfour empumalanga kanye nethembisa egauteng.
xho: kwakhona sikwatyelele neendawo abantu abahlala kuzo, kuquka nebalfour empumalanga nethembisa egauteng.

ssw: ngemuva kwekuvakashela ebalfour, sitfumele litsimba lemalunga layimfica etindvuna kutsi avakashele lendzawo kute ayewubukana netindzaba letiphakanyiswe ngummango.
xho: emva kotyelelo lwasebalfour, sithumele iqela lomphathiswa elimalungu alithoba ukuba lityelele lommandla ukuze lisombulule le miba ibiphakanyiswe ngabahlali.

ssw: tindzaba letinyenti setivele tiyabukisiswa.
xho: iliqela imiba esele ihoyiwe.

ssw: ngiyalele tindvuna kutsi tibukane netindzaba letisasele.
xho: ndiyalele ukuba abaphathiswa mabahoyane nemiba esaseleyo.

ssw: sisasho futsi kutsi atikho tikhalo letivumela ludlame nekucekelwa phansi kwemphahla.
xho: siya phinda sithi akukho nasiphi na isikhalazo esifunisa ubundlongondlongo nokutshatyalaliswa kwempahla.

ssw: siyalele tikhungo letibukene nekulandzelwa kwemtsetfo kutsi titsatse tinyatselo leticinile kulabo labangahloniphi umtsetfo ebalfour nakuletinye tindzawo.
xho: siyalele i-arhente zabezomthetho ukuba zithabathe amanyathelo aqatha kuwo nawuphi na umbodamo osebalfour nakwezinye iindawo.

ssw: ngengongoni 2009, ikhabinethi ivume lisu lekugucula kusebenta kwetintfo kubohulumende basekhaya.
xho: kweyomga yama-2009, ikhabhinethi iphumeze isicwangciso-qhinga sokudala inguqu koorhulumente basekhaya.

ssw: loku kutawucinisekisa kutsi bohulumende basekhaya banebuphatsi lobufanele, nemakhono ekuphatsa kanye newebuchwepheshe.
xho: oku kuya kuqinisekisa ukuba oorhulumente basekhaya banolawulo olufanelekileyo, izakhono zezolawulo nezobugcisa ezifanelekileyo.

ssw: kulomnyaka wekwenta, asibambisaneni ekwenteni bohulumende basekhaya babe ngumsebenti wakhe wonkhe umuntfu.
xho: kuwo lo nyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe, masisebenzisane ukwenza oorhulumente basekhaya babe ngumsebenzi wonmtu wonke.

ssw: sisebentela kwenta ncono tindzawo tekuhlala letingakahleleki kanye nekuniketela ngetinsita letifanele kanye nebunini bemhlaba lokungenani kumakhaya langu-500 000 nga-2014.
xho: sijonge ekuphuculeni iindawo zokuhlala zasematyotyombeni ezimi kwindawo entle size sinikezele ngeenkonzo ezifanelekileyo nelungelo lokuhlala isigxina kwimizi engama-500 000 ubuncinane ngowama-2014.

ssw: sihlela kubekela eceleni emahektha langetulu kwa-6 000 emhlaba losedvutane nemmango kute kwakhiwe kuwo tindlu talabahola kancane naletingabiti kakhulu.
xho: siceba ukubekela bucala ngaphezulu kweehektare ezingama-6 000 omhlaba karhulumente osendaweni entle ukwenzela ukwakha izindlu zabo bamivuzo iphantsi nezifikelelekayo.

ssw: umtamo lomusha loyinsika kutawuba kucabangela bantfu labahola kakhulu kute batfole kusitwa ngetimali nguhulumende, kodvwa lokubonakala bahola kancane ngendlela yekutsi abakulungeli kusitwa ngemabhange kutsi batsenge tindlu.
xho: iphulo elitsha elingundoqo liya kuba kukulungiselela abo bamivuzo iphezulu ukuba bangafumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente, kodwa besamkela kancinci kakhulu ukuba bangafumana imali-mboleko yebhanki eqhelekileyo yokuthenga indlu.

ssw: sitawubeka sikhwama sesicinisekiso semali lengemarandi layibhiliyoni yinye kute sikhutsate bemabhange latimele kanye neluphiko lwetetindlu, kutsi basungule umkhicito lomusha lotawuhlangabetana netimfuno tetindlu.
xho: siza kuseka ingxowa-mali yesiqinisekiso se-r1 sebhiliyoni ukukhuthaza iibhanki zabucala necandelo lezezindlu, ukuba ziphuhlise imveliso entsha ukukhawulelana noku kufuneka kwezindlu.

ssw: bakitsi,emnyakeni lowengcile sitsite, bantfu basemakhaya nabo banelilungelo lekuba nagezi, emanti, imithoyi lehanjiswa ngemanti kanye nemigwaco.
xho: bantu bakuthi,kunyaka ophelileyo sathi, abantu basemaphandleni nabo banelungelo lokuba nombane, amanzi, izindlu zangasese ezigungxulwayo neendlela.

ssw: satsi kumele babe netindzawo tetemidlalo kanye netindzawo letinetitolo tekutsenga letinkhulu letincono njengaleto tasemadolobheni.
xho: sathi kufanele babe neendawo zezemidlalo kunye neendawo zokuthenga ezinkulu neziphucukileyo njengezasezidolophini.

ssw: kuloku, sisukumise indzawo yekucala lokutawuhlolwa kuyo luhlelo loluphelele lwekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya egiyani, elimpopo, ngengci emnyakeni lowengcile.
xho: kule meko, sisungule isiza selinge lokuqala lenkqubo yophuhliso olubanzi lwasemaphandleni egiyani, elimpopo, kweyethupha kulo nyaka uphelileyo.

ssw: kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi, sekwakhiwe tindlu letingama-231.
xho: ukususela ngelo xesha, ngama-231 ezindlu ezakhiweyo.

ssw: kuphindze kwaba nenchubekelembili ekuniketelweni kwesakhiwonchanti kute kwesekelwe kutfutfukiswa kwetekulima, kanye nekuceceshwa kwemalunga emmango.
xho: inkqubela phambili yokubonelela ngeziseko zoncedo ukuxhasa uphuhliso lwezolimo, noqeqesho lwabahlali seyenziwe nayo.

ssw: kufinyelela etikhungweni tetemphilo netemfundvo kwentiwe ncono.
xho: ufikelelo kumaziko ezempilo nawezemfundo sele luphuculiwe.

ssw: senta tinhlelo letinjengaleto etindzaweni letisikhombisa eliveni lonkhe, letizuzisa emawadi langu-21.
xho: siphumeza iinkqubo ezifanayo kwiziza ezisixhenxe elizweni jikelele, oku kuza kuxhamlisa iwodi ezingama-21.

ssw: nga-2014, sihlose kuba netindzawo letinjalo kumawadi langu-160.
xho: ngowama-2014, sizimisele ukuba neziza kwiiwodi ezili-16.

ssw: sifuna emakhaya langu-60% kuletindzawo kutsi ahlangabetane netidzingo tawo tekudla emkhicitweni wabo nga-2014.
xho: sifuna imizi engama-60% kwezi ziza ukuba iphumeze iimfuno zayo zokutya ngemveliso yazo ngowama-2014.

ssw: kancane kancane kutawulunga, njengobe kusho sisho, tintfo letinkhulu ticala ngaletincane.
xho: kancinci kancinci kuza kude kulunge, bantu bakuthi, kuthiwa nenkqayi iqala ngentlontlo.

ssw: kumele futsi sihlanganise kancono tinhlelo teluhlelobusha lwemhlabatsi kanye netinhlelo letesekela tekulima.
xho: sikwafuna ukudibanisa ngcono iinkqubo zobuyiselo mhlaba nenkxaso yezolimo.

ssw: imphumelelo yetfu kulomkhakha itawukalwa ngekwenyuka kwelinani lebalimi labalima etindzaweni letincane labagcina sebakwati kutimela kutemnotfo.
xho: impumelelo yethu kule ndawo iya kubonakala ngokwanda kwenani lamafama ezinga elincinci athi akhule aphuhle kwezoqoqosho.

ssw: somlomo lohloniphekile nasihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe,asisilo live lelinemanti lamanyenti.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo nosihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo,asisilo lizwe lityebileyo kwicala lokuba namanzi.

ssw: kodvwa sisalahlekelwa ngemanti lamanyenti ngemaphayiphi lavutako nangesakhiwonchanti lesingakalungi.
xho: noxa kunjalo, sisalahlekelwa ngamanzi amaninzi ngenxa yemibhobho evuzayo nokungoneli kweziseko zoncedo.

ssw: sitawube sibeka tindlela tekunciphisa kulahlekela kwetfu ngemanti ngelinani lelinguhhafu nga-2014.
xho: siza kuba namanyathelo esiwabekayo ukunciphisa ukulahlekelwa kwethu ngamanzi kangangesiqingatha ngowama-2014.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,njengencenye yemitamo yetfu yekukhutsata kukhula kutemnotfo, sisebentela kunciphisa tindleko tekuchumana.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,njengenxalenye yethu yokukhuthaza ukukhula koqoqosho, sisazama indlela yokunciphisa iindleko zoqhagamshelwano.

ssw: ummango weleningizimu afrika ungabuka embili kulokunye futsi kunciphisa ngalokubanti, emanani abomakhalekhikhini, lucingo lwasendlini kanye netincingo temmango.
xho: uluntu lwasemzantsi afrika lungalindela okunye ukuthotywa kwamaxabiso othungelwano-maza, umnxeba weselula, umnxeba wocingo kunye namaxabiso eminxeba kawonkewonke.

ssw: sitawusebentela kwenyusa sivinini siphindze sicinisekise emazinga lasetulu etinhlelo te-intanethi, ngekuhambisana nenkhambiso yemave emhlaba.
xho: siza kusebenzela ukwandisa isantya sothungelwano-maza nokuqinisekisa izinga eliphezulu lenkonzo ye-intaneti, ngokuhambelana nemigangatho yezizwe ngezizwe.

ssw: takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,lohulumende utawucinisekisa kutsi imphahla yendalo netinsita letitfolakala endalweni tivikeleke kahle, nekutsi tiyachubeka nekukhuliswa.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,lo rhulumente uza kuqinisekisa ukuba indalo yethu nemithombo yethu yendalo ikhuseleke kakuhle, kwaye ixhotyiswa rhoqo.

ssw: ngekubambisana nelebrazil, indiya nechina, kuhlanganisa nelemelika, lemele emave latfutfukile, sifake ligalelo lelivakalako ekwemukelweni kwesivumelwano emhlanganweni wekugucuka kwesimo selitulu wasecopenhagen ngengongoni kulomyaka lowengcile.
xho: sikunye nebrazil, i-india nechina, kwangenelela ne-united states, emele ihlabathi eliphuhlileyo, senze igalelo elincomekayo kwisivumelwano esamkelwa kwindibano engokuguquguquka kwemozulu ebisecopenhagen kweyomnga kulo nyaka uphelileyo.

ssw: nanobe kungakefiki lapho kudzingeka khona, kodvwa kusinyatselo lesibalulekile njengobe onkhe emave aphendvula kulokugucuka kwesimo selitulu.
xho: nangona singahambi ngangokuba kulindelekile nje, linyathelo elibalulekileyo ukubheka phambili kuba sibophelela onke amazwe ukuba kubekho into ayenzayo ngokuguquguquka kwemozulu.

ssw: sitawusebenta ngemandla nebalingani betfu bemave emhlaba ngenhloso yekufinyelela esivumelwaneni lesibophako nalesisemtsefweni.
xho: siza kusebenza ngokuthe chatha kunye noogxa bethu bezizwe ngezizwe sisebenzela isivumelwano esibophelela ngokusemthethweni.

ssw: njengeningizimu afrika, sitibophetele ngekutitsandzela emananini lesitibekele wona ekunciphisa kungcoliswa kwemoya, kantsi sitawuchubeka nekusebentela kuhlangabetana nendlelasu yetfu yesikhatsi lesidze yekunciphisa kugucuka kwesimo selitulu.
xho: njengomzantsi afrika, sizibophelele ngokuzithandela kwiinjongo eziphambili ezibaluliweyo zokunciphisa ungcoliseko, kwaye siza kuqhubekeka ukusebenzisa isicwangciso-qhinga sethu sokunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwemozulu sexesha elide.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,sitawucinisa imitamo yetfu yekuchubekisela embili tinhloso teningizimu afrika emhlabeni wonkhe.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,siza kuqinisa amalinge wethu okuphakamisa iimfuno zomzantsi afrika kwihlabathi jikelele.

ssw: sitawesekela imitamo yekunonophisa kuhlangana kutembusave nakutemnotfo kwesifundza se-sadc, kanye nekukhutsata kuhwebelana nekusisa emkhatsini kwemave akulesifundza.
xho: siza kuwaxhasa amalinge okukhawulezisa indibaniselwano yepolitiki neyoqoqosho yommandla wenkqubo yokuphuhliswa kwamazwe e-afrika esemazantsi (i-sadc), nokukhuthaza urhwebo notyalo-mali phakathi kulo mmandla.

ssw: iningizimu afrika iyachubeka nekudlala indzima lesembili emitameni yelivekati kute kuciniswe lubumbano lwe-afrika netinhlaka talo, kanye nekusebentela bunye.
xho: umzantsi afrika usaqhubekeka ukudlala indima ephambili kumalinge elizwekazi ukomeleza imanyano yamazwe ase-afrika kunye neziseko zayo, nokusebenzela umanyano.

ssw: sitawugcila kutemandla ekuniketeni kabusha emandla budlelwane lobusha bekutfutfukiswa kwe-afrika, njengendlelasu yekutfutfukisa temnotfo kulelivekati.
xho: siza kunikezela amandla ekuvuseleleni ubudlelwane obutsha bophuhliso lwe-afrika, njengesicwangciso-qhinga sophuhliso loqoqosho kwilizwekazi.

ssw: takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,umsebenti wahulumende kumele usabele elubitweni lwekwenta lesigamu sibe ngulesinye sekusebenta ngekunonopha kanye nekusebenta kwembuso lokwentiwe ncono.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,inkonzo karhulumente isabele kubizo lokwenza eli ixesha lokuqala lokusebenza msinyane nokuphuculwa komsebenzi karhulumente.

ssw: sidzinga kusebenta ngalokuncomekako nangemandla.
xho: siza kulindela ukusebenza okugqwesileyo nokusebenza ngamandla.

ssw: sidzinga tisebenti tahulumende letitimisele, letinemakhono naletinakekela tidzingo tetakhamiti.
xho: sifuna abasebenzi bakarhulumente abakhutheleyo, abakwaziyo ukusebenza nabazikhathaleleyo iimfuno zoluntu.

ssw: hulumende sewuvele usebentela ekutfutfukiseni nasekwetfuleni luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa umsebenti wahulumende, lolutawubeka inkhambiso necophelo etisebentini tahulumende kuyo yonkhe imikhakha.
xho: urhulumente sele esebenzela uphuhliso nokuphunyezwa kwenkqubo yophuhliso lwenkonzo karhulumente, oluya kucacisa indlela nomgangatho wokuziphatha kwabasebenzi bakarhulumente kuwo onke amazinga.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,sichubekisa imitamo yetfu yekucedza inkhohlakalo nekweba eluhlelweni lwekuniketwa kwemisebenti nemathenda, naseticelweni tetincwadzi tekushayela, kutibonelelo tahulumende nakubomatisi, phakatsi kwalokunye.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,siyaqhubekeka ngamalinge wethu okuncothula urhwaphilizo nenkohliso ekunikezelweni kwemisebenzi neenkqubo zeziniki maxabiso, nakwizicelo zeempepha mvume zokuqhuba, inkxaso-mali karhulumente yezentlalo namaxwebhu ezazisi, phakathi kwezinye.

ssw: siyajabula ngenchubekelembili hulumende lasayentile kuleminye imikhakha.
xho: sixolile yinkqubela urhulumente ayenzayo kwezinye iindawo.

ssw: kuleliviki, sicedze kukhokhelwa kwetibonelelo tahulumende letinenkhohlakalo letingu-32 687, letibita imali lengemarandi latigidzi letingu-180.
xho: kule veki, sirhoxise iintlawulo zenkxaso-mali karhulumente yezentlalo zenkohliso ezingama-32 687, ezixabisa i-r180 lezigidi.

ssw: likomiti letindvuna lelibukene nenkhohlakalo lisabuka tindlela tekucedza nya inkhohlakalo.
xho: ikomiti yethu yabaphathiswa ejongene norhwaphilizo isakhangela iindlela zokuloyisa luphele nya urhwaphilizo.

ssw: ngekusebentisana singenta lokunyenti.
xho: xa sisebenzisana singenza ngcono.

ssw: bakitsi,njengobe nati, setfule inombolo yekutsintana nelihhovisi lamengameli kute sente hulumende nelihhovisi lamengameli lifinyeleleke kummango, kanye nekusita kuvulela kweftulwa kwetinsita letivalelekile.
xho: bantu bakuthi,njengoko nisazi, savelisa umnxeba kamongameli ongavalwayo ukwenza ufikelelo kurhulumente nakumongameli lube lula ngakumbi kuluntu, nokunceda ukususa imiqobo ekunikezelo nkonzo.

ssw: lenombolo yamengameli imele kutimisela kwetfu ekwenteni tintfo kuhulumende ngalokwehlukile.
xho: lo mnxeba ungavalwayo ubonakalisa ukuzimisela kwethu ekwenzeni izinto ngendlela eyahlukileyo eburhulumenteni.

ssw: kwente umehluko etimphilweni tetakhamiti letinyenti teleningizimu afrika.
xho: lo mnxeba wenze umahluko kubomi babemi bomzantsi afrika abaninzi.

ssw: singabala nkt.
xho: singakhankanya unkosk.

ssw: buziwe ngaleka wasemount frere, lowaba nesicelo sekucala lesasitsatsa lebesimayelana nemphesheni yemyeni wakhe longasekho, lolu kwaba lucingo lolwatsatfwa elusukwini lwekucala kwekusebenta kwalenombolo.
xho: buziwe ngaleka wasemount frere, omnxeba wakhe umalunga nemali yomhlalaphantsi yomyeni wakhe ongasekhoyo waba ngowokuqala esawufumanayo ngosuku lokuqala lale nkonzo.

ssw: sinaye emkhatsini kwetfu lamuhla.
xho: ukunye nathi apha ngokuhlwa nje.

ssw: nkululeko cele, lowasitwa kutfola tincwadzi tamatisi, lokwamenta wakwati kubhalisa enyuvesi yethekhinoloji yasetshwane.
xho: kwakhona phakathi kwethu sinomnu nkululeko cele, owancedakala ngokuthi afumane ixwebhu lakhe lesazisi, elathi lamenza ukuba akwazi ukubhalisa kwi-yunivesiti yezobugcisa yasethswane.

ssw: leti tindzaba letimbili nje kuphela temphumelelo emkhatsini kwaletinyenti.
xho: la ngamabini nje kumabali amaninzi empumelelo.

ssw: kuleti naletinye tibonelo, sibona butsakatsaka lokumele bulungiswe tinhlaka tahulumende letahlukahlukene.
xho: kule neminye imizekelo, siqaphele ubuthakathaka ekufanele bulungiswe ngamazinga awohluka hlukeneyo aseburhulumenteni.

ssw: ngasomlomo, simeme titfunywa temacembu lahlukene ephalamende kutsi avakashele sikhungo setincingo, kute emalunga ephalamende atotibonela umsebenti lowentiwako.
xho: ngegunya likasomlomo, siye samema igqiza lamaqela ngamaqela asepalamente ukuba atyelele eli ziko lomnxeba, ukuze amalungu epalamente azibonele ngokwawo umsebenzi owenziwayo.

ssw: bakitsi nebangani,ngichaze tincenye letimbalwa teluhlelo lwetfu lwa-2010, kutibophetela kwetfu sisonkhe njengahulumende kubantfu beleningizimu.
xho: bantu bakuthi nabahlobo,ndizicacisile iimpawu zezicwangciso zethu zowama-2010, isibophelelo sethu esihlangeneyo njengorhulumente kubantu basemzantsi afrika.

ssw: inkhulumo leyetfulelwa sive iniketa sibutsetelo lesibanti seluhlelo lwetfu lwekwenta.
xho: intetho kamongameli engobume besizwe inika umfanekiso ophangaleleyo wesicwangciso sethu somsebenzi.

ssw: tindvuna titawuniketa umbiko lowenabile ngalesikhatsi tetfula tinkhulumo tawo temcombelelotimali.
xho: abaphathiswa baza kunikezela ngeenkcukacha kwiintetho zabo zohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwabo olwahluka hlukeneyo.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile, takhamiti teleningizimu afrika,ngelweti kulomnyaka, sitawube sigubha umnyaka wa-150 wekufika kwemandiya eningizimu afrika.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo, bemi bomzantsi afrika,kweyenkanga kulo nyaka, siya kuphawula isikhumbuzo seminyaka eli-150 yokufika kwamandiya emzantsi afrika.

ssw: kuniketa litfuba lekubona kubaluleka kwesandla lesifakwe ngummango wemandiya emikhakheni yetemisebenti, temabhizimisi, tesayensi, temidlalo, tenkholo, tebuciko, temasiko kanye nasekutfolweni nasekuhlanganisweni kwentsandvo yetfu yelinyenti.
xho: oku kunikeza ithuba lokuba sikwazi ukubaluleka kwegalelo elenziwe ngamandiya kumacandelo ezemisebenzi, ezoshishino, ezenzululwazi, ezemidlalo, ezenkolo, ezobugcisa, ezenkcubeko nempumelelo nokomeleza intando yethu yesininzi.

ssw: bakitsi nebangani,asengitsatse lelitfuba ngiphindze ngendlulise emavi endvudvuto kuhulumende kanye nebantfu basehaiti ngenhlekelele nekufa lokubuhlungu lokubavelele.
xho: bantu bakuthi nabahlobo,mandithathe eli thuba lokuba ndivakalise kwakhona uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kurhulumente nabantu basehaiti ngesihelegu sentlekele ethe yabehlela.

ssw: siyajabula kutsi litsimba lebasiti betfu likwatile kuyewusita.
xho: sinovuyo lokuba amaqela wethu ezohlangulo akwazile ukuya kunceda.

ssw: ngitsandza kubonga sakhamuti seleningizimu afrika lesihlala singahluleki kusita njalo etikhatsini tetinhlekelele, siphindze sisite tsine ekukhuliseni umbono wekuba ngummango lonakekelako.
xho: ndingathanda ukuqaphela ngokukodwa omnye ummi womzantsi afrika osoloko ephumelela ukuya kunceda ngamaxesha entlekele, nosincedayo ukukhuthaza umoya wesizwe esikhathalayo.

ssw: imtiaz sooliman we-gift of the givers lesinaye lapha lamuhla.
xho: siyamamkela kule ndlu namhlanje ugqr imtiaz sooliman wegift of the givers.

ssw: bakitsi beleningizimu afrika,kubanjwa kwemidlalo yendzebe yemhlaba ye-fifa kwenta 2010 abe ngumnyaka wekwenta mbamba.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,ukusingatha umnyhadala wendebe yehlabathi yefifa yenza owama-2010 ngokwenene ube ngunyaka wokuba kusetyenzwe.

ssw: sichitse iminyaka leminyenti sihlelela lendzebe yemhlaba.
xho: sichithe iminyaka emininzi silungiselela lendebe yehlabathi.

ssw: sisalelwe tinyanga letintsatfu kuphela.
xho: sishiyekelwe nje ziinyanga ezintathu.

ssw: kantsi sitimisele kwenta lemidlalo ibe yimphumelelo.
xho: kwaye sizimisele ukuyenza ibe yimpumelelo.

ssw: sakhiwonchanti, tekuvikeleka kanye naletinye tinhlelo setikhona kute kucinisekiswe umchudzelwano loyimphumelelo.
xho: iziseko zoncedo, ukhuselo namalungiselelo ezinto eziyimfuneko sele enziwe ukuqinisekisa umnyhadala oyimpumelelo.

ssw: njengesive, kumele sibonge likomiti leligcugcutelela imidlalo ya-2010 ngemtamo wabo lomuhle.
xho: njengesizwe, kufanele ukuba siyibulele ikomiti yasekhaya eququzelelelayo yowama-2010 ngomsebenzi wayo omhle.

ssw: sifisela sihlalo welikomiti leligcugcutelela lemidlalo, irvin khoza, sikhulu lesisetulu danny jordaan kanye nemceceshi webafana bafana, carlos alberto parreira, konkhe lokuhle kuletinyanga letilandzelako.
xho: sinqwenela usihlalo wayo, u-irvin khoza, igosa eliyintloko yesigqeba solawulo udanny jordaan kunye nomqeqeshi webafana bafana, ucarlos alberto parreira, amathamsanqa odwa kwezi nyanga zizayo.

ssw: mengameli mandela bekasembili ekusiteni lelive kutsi litfole emalungelo ekubamba lomdlalo lomkhulu nakangaka.
xho: umongameli mandela ube negalelo ekuncedeni ilizwe lethu ukuba linikwe amalungelo okusingatha lo mnyhadala mkhulu kangaka.

ssw: ngako kumele sente lendzebe yemhlaba ibe yimphumelelo kute sihloniphe yena.
xho: ngoko ke kufanele ukuba lendebe yehlabathi siyenze impumelelo enkulu njengentlonipho yokumbulela.

ssw: bakitsi, asesisekele licembu lesive i-bafana bafana.
xho: bantu bakuthi, nathi masilixhase iqela lethu lesizwe ibafana bafana.

ssw: ngingulomunye walabakholwelwa ekutseni i-bafana bafana itawugila timanga.
xho: ndingomnye wabo bakholelwa ukuba ibafana bafana iza kwenza imimangaliso.

ssw: lokukhulu, tsenga lithikithi lakho!
xho: okona kubaluleke kakhulu, itikiti esandlelni bantu bakuthi!

ssw: sonkhe asitsengeni emathikithi kusenesikhatsi kute sikwati kuhambela lemidlalo.
xho: sonke masithenge amatikiti kuselithuba ukuze sikwazi ukuya emidlalweni.

ssw: bakitsi beleningizimu afrika,njengobe sibungata kukhululwa kwamadiba lamuhla, siyaphindza futsi sitibophetela ekubuyisaneni, kulubumbano lwavelonkhe, eliveni lelite buhlanga kanye nasekwakheni likusasa lelincono sisonkhe njengetakhamiti teleningizimu afrika, labamnyama nalabamhlophe.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,njengoko sibhiyozela ukukhululwa kukamadiba namhlanje, sizibophelela ngokutsha kuxolelwano, umanyano lwesizwe, ukungabi nabuhlanga nokwakha ikamva elingcono njengabemi bomzantsi afrika, abamnyama nabamhlophe.

ssw: siholwa nguloko madiba lakusho ngalesikhatsi asebhokisini atekiswa licala, nakatsi:"imphilo yami yonkhe ngiyinikele kulomzabalazo webantfu base-afrika.
xho: sikhokelwa koko kwathethwa ngumadiba esemkhumbini, ndiya caphula:?

ssw: ngilwe nekubuswa ngulabamhlophe, ngalwa nekubuswa ngulabamnyama.
xho: ngexesha lokuphila kwam ndinikela ubomi bam kumzabalazo wabantu abamnyama.

ssw: ngilondvolote umcondvo wemmango wentsandvo yelinyenti nalokhululekile, lapho bonkhe bantfu batewuhlala ndzawonye ngekuthula, futsi banematfuba lalinganako.
xho: ndilwile nokuthi abamhlophe babe ngentla kwezinye iintlanga, ndaza ndalwa nokuthi abamnyama babe ngentla kwezinye iintlanga."

ssw: 13 feb 2014somlomo lohloniphekile welibandla lavelonkhe,sihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe (ncop).
xho: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekileyo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe,sihlalo webhunga lesizwe lamaphondo (i-ncop).

ssw: sekela somlomo welibandla lavelonkhe nasekela sihlalo wemkhandlu wetifundza wavelonkhe.
xho: sekela somlomo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yesizwe nosekela sihlalo we-ncop.

ssw: sekela mengameli weriphabhulikhi yeningizimu afrika, mhlonishwa kgalema motlanthe.
xho: sekela mongameli werhiphabliki, ohloniphekileyo ukgalema montlanthe.

ssw: sekela mengameli wangaphambilini baleka mbethe,mhlonishwa jaji lelikhulu leriphabhulikhi yeningizimu afrika, nani nonkhe malunga lahloniphekile etebulungiswa.
xho: owayesakuba ngusekela mongameli ubaleka mbethe,ehloniphekileyo ijaji eyintloko, nawo onke amalungu ahloniphekileyo ecandeloleenkundla.

ssw: tindvuna letihloniphekile nabosekela tindvuna,tindvuna tetifundza letikhetsekile nabosomlomo betifundza tetfu.
xho: kubaphathiswa abahloniphekileyo nakoosekela baphathiswa,kwiinkulumbuso ezihloniphekileyo noosomlomo bamaphondo.

ssw: sihlalo wenhlangano yabohulumende basekhaya eningizimu afrika, nabo bonkhe buholi babohulumende basekhaya.
xho: kusihlalo webhunga loomasipala basemzantsi afrika (i-salga), kunye nazo zonke iinkokheli zoorhulumente basekhaya.

ssw: sihlalo wendlu yavelonkhe yebaholi bendzabuko.
xho: kwintloko zamaziko karhulumente axhasa intando yesininzi.

ssw: mphatsi welibhangesilulu,baholi bemabhizinisi, temidlalo, tendzabuko, tetenkholo nayo yonkhe leminye imikhakha,malunga emancusa akulamanye emave, tivakashi letikhetsekile naletihloniphekile,malunga lahloniphekile,bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.
xho: kwirhuluneli yebhanki enguvimba,kwiinkokheli zezoshishino, zezemidlalo, zezemveli, zezenkolo nezawo onke amacandelo,kumalungu wezozakuzo, kwiindwendwe ezikhethekileyo nezibalulekileyo,kumalungu ahloniphekileyo,bemi zomzantsi afrikagood evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndimadekwana, goeienaand.

ssw: ngitsandza kubonga tikhulu letengamele ngekungika lelitfuba lekutsi ngikhulume nebantfu baseningizimu afrika, kulomkhosi wekugcina wenkhulumo yebunjalo belive, lokungewesine webuholi bentsandvo yelinyenti.
xho: ndinqwenela ukubulela amagosa awongameleyo ngeli thuba lokuthetha nabantu basemzantsi afrika, kulo msitho wentetho kamongameli engobume besizwe (i-sona), yokugqibela kolu lawulo lwesine lwentando yesininzi.

ssw: ngitsandza kwendlulisa emavi etfu endvudvuto ngekushona kwemhlonishwa mnu.
xho: ndithanda ukudlulisa amazwi wethu wovelwano olunzulu ngokushiywa kwethu ngongasekhoyo ohloniphekileyo umnu.

ssw: ben skhosana, longumunye wemalunga lasasebente sikhatsi lesidze futsi lomdzala kulendlu lehloniphekile nalobekayindvuna yaphambilini yelitiko letekucondziswa kwesimilo.
xho: ben skhosana, omnye wawona malungu asebenze ithuba elide nokwalelinye lawona malungu aphezulu wale ndlu ihloniphekileyo nowayesakuba ngumphathiswa wethu weenkonzo zezoluleko.

ssw: sibuhlungu kakhulu ngekusishiya kwakhe ngekutuma.
xho: sibuhlungu kakhulu kukusishiya kwakhe ngesiquphe.

ssw: sindlulisela kukhala kwetfu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we-inkatha freedom party (ifp) shenge, kanye nawo onkhe emalunga e-ifp.
xho: sidlulisa uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kusapho lwakhe, nakwinkokheli ye-inkatha freedom party (i-ifp) ushenge, kunye nawo onke amalungu we-ifp.

ssw: somlomo lohloniphekile,sihlalo lohloniphekile we-ncop,lena yinkhulumo yebunjalo belive yekucala leyetfulwa angekho mengameli wetfu longumsunguli, umhlonishwa nelson rolihlahla mandela.
xho: sidlulisa ukukhala kwethu emndenini wakhe, nakumholi we ifp ushenge, kanye namalunga onke e-ifp.

ssw: kusishiya kwakhe emhlabeni, ngembi nje kwekutsi kube yiminyaka lenge-20 yenkhululeko yetfu nentsandvo yelinyenti, kwabanga buhlungu lobukhulu kubantfu bakitsi nangesheya kweminyele yetfu.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,sihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncop,le yi-sona yokuqala eqhubeka engasekho umongameli owayengumseki wentando yesininzi yethu, ohloniphekileyo unelson rolihlahla mandela.

ssw: sitfola kudvudvuteka ekwatini kutsi madiba utawuhlala aphila njalo etinhlitiyweni tetfu, nekutsi futsi sinemsebenti wekuchubela embili umshiyandvuku wakhe.
xho: ukusishiya kwakhe, kanye xa sisecicini lokufika konyaka wama-20 wenkululeko yethu nolawulo lwentando yesininzi, kubangele intlungu enkulu kubantu bakuthi nangaphaya kwemida yethu.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,live letfu likhicite emadvodza nebafati labakhetsekile, lababe baholi ngetikhatsi letimatima.
xho: sifumana ukuthuthuzeleka ezingqondweni kuba umadiba uzakuhlala ehleli ezintliziyweni zethu, kwaye sinoxanduva lokuba siqhubekeke ngomsebenzi wakhe.

ssw: moses kotane, umgcinisikhwama jikelele waphambilini wakhongolose namabhalane jikelele waphambilini welicembu lemakhomasinisi laseningizimu afrika.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,ilizwe lethu livelise amadoda namakhosikazi agqamileyo, athe abonakalise ubunkokheli ngamaxesha anzima.

ssw: sihloniphekile kuba nemkakhe lotsandzekako, make rebecca kotane, njengesivakashi setfu lesikhetsekile lamuhla kusihlwa.
xho: omnye wezo nkokheli yayingumnu moses kotane, owayesakuba ngunondyebo jikelele we-anc esakuba kwanguye nonobhala jikelele wombutho wamakomanisi womzantsi afrika (i-sacp).

ssw: make kotane uhlanganise iminyaka yebudzala le-102 itolo, futsi simfisela lokuhle kodvwa.
xho: siwongekile kukuba nenkosikazi yakhe ethandekayo phakathi kwethu, umama urebecca kotane, njengendwendwe lethu elikhethekileyo ngobu busuku.

ssw: oliver tambo, lowagcina sibane senkhuleko sivutsa ekhaya nangesheya ngesikhatsi lesimatima kakhulu semzabalazo wetfu.
xho: umama ukotane ugqibe iminyaka eli-102 ubudala izolo, kwaye simnqwenelela okuhle kodwa.

ssw: setfulela solomon mahlangu sigcoko, lijaha lebelinesibindzi lelahamba ngekweyisa lacondza etingodvweni tekulengiswa nga-1979 lapho labulawa khona lineminyaka lenge-23 budzala.
xho: sikwakhumbula ngokunika imbeko owayesakuba ngumongameli we-anc umnu oliver tambo, owagcina isibane senkululeko siphila (ithemba lenkululeko liphila) apha ekhaya nakumazwe angaphesheya ngawona maxesha ayengawona anzima omzabalazo.

ssw: watsi: “ingati yami itawunisela futsi ivundzise sihlahla lesitawutsela titselo tenkhululeko.
xho: wathetha wathi: “igazi lam liyakunkcenkceshela umthi oyakuvelisa iziqhamo zenkululeko.

ssw: tjela bantfu bakitsi kutsi ngiyabatsandza.
xho: nixelele abantu bam ukuba ndiyabathanda.

ssw: sihlonishiwe ngekuba khona kwamake wakhe, make martha mahlangu nemtukulu wakhe bathabile.
xho: baze baqhubekeke ngokuzabalaza.”siwongekile kukusindleka umama wakhe, umama umartha mahlangu kunye nomzukulwana wakhe ubathabile.

ssw: lomnyaka wa-2014 ubuye futsi ube ngumnyaka wekugujwa kweminyaka lenge-40 kwabulawa ngebugwala kwemholi wetitjudeni abram onkgopotse tiro nga-1974 ebotswana kusetjentiswa emaphasela emabhomu ,.
xho: unyaka wama-2014 ukwaphawula isikhumbuzo sonyaka wama-40 wokugetyengwa ngobugwala ngesiqhushumbisi esiyipasile, kwenkokheli yabafundi, u-abram onkgopotse tiro ngowe-1974 ebotswana.

ssw: semukela umnakabo, mogomotsi tiro kulomkhosi.
xho: siyamamkela umntakwabo, umogomotsi tiro kulo msitho.

ssw: sivakalisa kubonga kwebantfu, ngekutinikela kwemnakabo ngekutidzela.
xho: sivakalisa umbulelo wabantu bakuthi, ngokuzenza idini komntakwabo engakhathalelanga siqu sakhe kuphela.

ssw: sikhumbula labo labashona kubudlova lobebusekelwa ngetimali ngumbuso ngeminyaka yangabo-1980 nangabo-1990 emalokishini etfu.
xho: siyabakhumbula abo bathi basweleka kubundlobongela obabufumana inkxaso yorhulumente weminyaka yama-1980 nama-1990 kwiilokishi zethu nasezilalini.

ssw: jabu ndlovu, umeleli wenyonyane yavelonkhe yalabasebenta ngetinsimbi yaseningizimu afrika (i-numsa), wadvutjulwa washona nga-1988 emgungundlovu kanye nendvodza yakhe jabulani nendvodzana yabo.
xho: unks jabu ndlovu, owayesakuba ngummeli wabasebenzi wombutho wabasebenzi besinyithi wasemzantsi afrika (i-numsa), wadutyulwa wasweleka ngowe-1988 emgungundlovu kunye nomyeni ujabulani nonyana wakhe.

ssw: semukela indvodzakati yabo luhle nendvodzana yabo, sanele, sibuye futsi sihloniphe yonkhe imindeni leyashonelwa ngulabatsandzekako bayo, kuwo wonkhe umkhakha wetepolitiki.
xho: siyayamkela intombi yakhe uluhle nonyana wayo, usanele, kwaye sidlulisela uvelwano lwethu olunzulu kuzo zonke iintsapho ezathe zaphulukana nabo bezibathanda, kuyo yonke imibutho yopolitiko.

ssw: somlomo lohloniphekile,sihlalo lohloniphekile we-ncop,sakhona kuncoba bonkhe lobo buhlungu besikhatsi lesengcile sabuye sakha ummango lomusha.
xho: somlomo ohloniphekileyo,sihlalo ohloniphekileyo we-ncop,sikwazile ukoyisa intlungu yangaphambili sakhe uluntu olutsha.

ssw: sesakhe tikhungo leticinile tentsandvo yelinyenti.
xho: sakhe amaziko awomeleleyo wentando yesininzi.

ssw: siwungcwabile umbuso welubandlululo lobewungasiyo intsandvo yelinyenti, lobewungameleli, ugcilatana ukhohlakele futsi lebewusebentela lidlantana.
xho: siwungcwabile umbuso ongenalawulo lwentando yesininzi, ongamelanga luntu, wengcinezelo nogcwele lurhwaphilizo owawusebenzela iimfuno zegcuntswana kuphela.

ssw: sakhe hulumende wentsandvo yelinyenti longabandlululi ngekwebulili, ngekwebuhlanga, lotiphendvulelako ubuye umelele bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika.
xho: siqulunqe urhulumente obumbeneyo wamaqela ngamaqela, ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, nangokwesini wolawulo lwentando yesininzi, obizwa asabele nomele bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika.

ssw: sakhe intsandvo yelinyenti lebuswa ngumtsetfosisekelo lonemphumelo, lonetinhlaka tembuso letisebenta kahle kakhulu – sishayamtsetfo, sigungu lesiphetse netebulungiswa.
xho: sidale ulawulo lwentando yesininzi olusekelezelwe kumgaqo-siseko, olunemilenze esebenza ngokubonakalayo yombuso – izindlu zowiso-mithetho, ikhabhinethi neejaji zeenkundla.

ssw: sinetikhungo tahulumende letesekela intsandvo yelinyenti tibuye tivikele emalungelo etakhamiti.
xho: sinamaziko abizwa ngokuba ngamaziko esahluko se-9 axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi aze akhusele amalungelo wabemi.

ssw: inkhululeko nentsandvo yelinyenti nako kwakhe sikhala semmango lonemdlandla kanye nebetindzaba labakhululekile.
xho: inkululeko nolawulo lwentando yesininzi lukwadale amathuba oluntu olusebenzayo nenkululeko yamajelo eendaba.

ssw: inkhululeko ibuye yaletsa kwekucala ngca, setsembiso sekulingana ngekwebulili.
xho: inkululeko okokuqala ikwasiphathele, ithemba lomakulingwane ngokwesini.

ssw: kumelelwa kwabomake kutikhungo tahulumende kukhule kakhulu kusukela ekucaleni kwenkhululeko, futsi nekukhuliswa kwetinsitanchanti nako kuyabazuzisa bomake.
xho: ukumelwa kwabantu basetyhini kumaziko karhulumente kwande ngokuncomekayo ukususela oko kwafika inkululeko, kwaye ukunatyiswa kweenkonzo ezingundoqo kukwaxhamlisa abantu basetyhini.

ssw: onkhe lamagalelo ente iningizimu afrika yaba yindzawo lencono kakhulu kutsi kuhlalwe kuyo manje kunangaphambilini.
xho: zonke ezi mpawu zenze umzantsi afrika ube lelona lizwe lingcono onokuhlala kulo kunokuba kwakunjalo.

ssw: nanoma kunjalo, live letfu lisebukene netinselele tebuphuya, kungalingani nekungabi khona kwemisebenti, lesiloku sibukene nako.
xho: nangona kunjalo, ilizwe lethu lisajongene nomngeni ontlandlo-ntathu wendlala, ukungalingani nentswela-ngqesho, esisaqhubekayo ukusokola ngazo.

ssw: kubukana naletinselele sekube nguyonantfo lebalulekile lekugcilwe kuyo yabo bonkhe buphatsi bentsandvo yelinyenti.
xho: ukuqubisana nale mingeni kube yeyona nto bonke oorhulumente bentando yesininzi bagxile kuyo.

ssw: sikhetse kugcila etintfweni letisihlanu letihamba embili, temfundvo, temphilo, kulwa nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo, kutfutfukiswa kwetindzawo tasemaphandleni nekulungiswa kabusha kwemhlaba kanye nekwakha imisebenti lenesitfunti.
xho: sikhethe ukugxila kwimiba ephambili emihlanu, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo, uphuhliso lwamaphandle nokuhlengahlengiswa komhlaba kwakunye nokudala amathuba emisebenzi endilisekileyo.

ssw: siphindze futsi sahlela kabusha umbuso kute kutfutfukiswe kusebenta.
xho: sikwahlengahlengise nombuso ukuba ukuphucula indlela osebenza ngayo.

ssw: sente imisebenti lemibili lemikhulu, kuhlela kwesikhatsi lesidze kanye nekulandzelela nekuhlola.
xho: sidale imisebenzi emibini engundoqo, isicwangciso sexesha elide kwakunye nohlolo novavanyo.

ssw: sisungule ikhomishini yekuhlela yavelonkhe lekhicite lesikhonkhwane luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa lwavelonkhe, lokuluhlelo lwalelive lwetenhlalo netemnotfo nalokungulokunye lokuzuziwe lokukhulu kwalohulumende wesine.
xho: saseka ikhomishoni yocwangciso yesizwe nethe yavelisa isicwangciso sophuhliso sesizwe esibe sisiganeko esibalulekileyo, isicwangciso sezentlalo noqoqosho kweli lizwe nesikwayenye yeempumelelo ezingundoqo zolawulo lorhulumente wesine.

ssw: loluhlelo lubeka kabanti ngalokufanele sikwente kute sicedze buphuya, kukhulisa ematfuba emisebenti nekunciphisa kungalingani kungakefiki umnyaka wa-2030.
xho: esi sicwangciso siyacacisa ukuba kufanele senze ntoni na ukuncothula indlala, ukwandisa amathuba emisebenzi nokunciphisa ukungalingani ungekafiki owama-2030.

ssw: kulandzelela nekuhlola kwetfu kukhombisa kutsi tinsita letinyenti tiyachubeka nekuba ncono.
xho: uhlolo novavanyo lwethu lusibonisa ukuba iinkonzo ezininzi ziyaqhubekeka ukuphucuka.

ssw: kwenta sibonelo nje, tibonelelo tahulumende tetenhlalo kanye nabomatisi nyalo sekutsatsa sikhatsi lesincane kutsi kucutjungulwe.
xho: umzekelo, izibonelelo zenkxaso yezentlalo namaxwebhu ezazisi ngoku athatha ixesha elifutshane ukwenziwa.

ssw: kepha letinye letinyenti tisadzinga kusetjentwa lokuchubekako.
xho: kodwa ezinye ezininzi zisafuna ukusetyenzwa.

ssw: ngitawetfula umbiko ngaloku lokusihlanu lokuhamba embili, ngitawucala ngetemnotfo.
xho: ndiza kufaka ingxelo ngale miba mihlanu ingundoqo, ndiqale ngezoqoqosho.

ssw: ngalokusemkhatsini, umnotfo ukhule ngemaphesenthi lama-3,2 ngemnyaka kusuka nga-1994 kuya ku-2012 nanoma nje umnotfo bewubutsakatsaka emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele lokwabanga kutsi kulahleke imisebenti lesigidzi.
xho: ngokomyinge, uqoqosho lukhule kangange-3,2 seepesenti ngonyaka ukususela kowe-1994 ukuya kowama-2012 nangona kubekho ukudodobala koqoqosho okubangele izigidi zabantu baphulukane nemisebenzi.

ssw: ngekusebentisana sonkhe njengahulumende, bemabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye nemkhakha wemmango, siwunakekele lomnotfo wate wavuka.
xho: ngentsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente, abezoshishino, imibutho yezabasebenzi nemibutho emele uluntu, siluthantamisile uqoqosho ukuba lubuyele esiqhelweni.

ssw: umcebo wavelonkhe, nawukalwa ngekwemkhicito lomkhulu wasekhaya (gdp), ukhule waba ngetulu kwa-3,5wetigidzigidzi letiphindvwe katsatfu temarandi.
xho: ubutyebi besizwe jikelele, xa bulinganiswa ngokwemveliso yangaphakathi epheleleyo, bukhule bade bedlula kwi-3,5 seetriliyoni zeerandi.

ssw: imisebenti manje iyasungulwa futsi.
xho: amathuba emisebenzi ayadalwa kwakhona.

ssw: manje sekunebantfu labatigidzi leti-15 labasebentako, linani lelikhulu kakhulu lelike labakhona kulelive, futsi kulomnyaka lophelile kuvulwe imisebenti lenge-650 000, ngekuya kwelihhovisi lelubalobalo laseningizimu afrika.
xho: bali-15 lezigidi abantu abaphangelayo apha kweli lizwe, elona nani liphezulu kwimbali yethu, kwaye kudalwe amathuba emisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-650 000 kulo nyaka uphelileyo, ngokutsho kweziko leenkcukhacha-manani lasemzantsi afrika.

ssw: loku solo akusiko lokukahle ngalokwenele.
xho: kodwa ke oko akwanelanga.

ssw: silinganisonani sekungacashwa solomane sisetulu.
xho: izinga lentswela-ngqesho lisephezulu.

ssw: kucashwa kwelusha eningizimu afrika kusachubeka nekuba yintfo leletsa kukhatsateka, njengoba kwenteka mhlaba wonkhe jikelele.
xho: intswela-ngqesho kulutsha emzantsi afrika isaxhalabisa nangoku, njengoko kunjalo nasehlabathini jikelele.

ssw: sitsatsa tinyatselo letinyenti, letifaka ekhatsi umtsetfo wekukhutsata intsela yekucashwa lokhutsata bacashi kutsi bacashe tisebenti letilusha.
xho: sinamanyathelo aliqela esiwathathayo, kuquka nomthetho werhafu yenkuthazo yezengqesho okhuthaza abaqeshi ukuba baqeshe abasebenzi abalulutsha.

ssw: kutawukhishwa imitsefosimiso letawucinisekisa kutsi loku akutsintsi kabi tisebenti letingatfoli selekelelo nalesetikhulile.
xho: kuza kuphunyezwa imithetho ukuqinisekisa ukuba oku akubachaphazeli kakubi abasebenzi abangafumani nkxaso yamali okanye abadala.

ssw: letinye tinyatselo ticuketfwe kusivumelwano selusha savelonkhe lesasayinwa esoweto ngamabasa lowendlulile.
xho: amanye amanyathelo aqulathwe kwisivumelwano solutsha sesizwe esatyikitywa esoweto kwekatshazimpunzi yonyaka odlulileyo.

ssw: luhlelo lwetemisebenti lekhulisiwe yahulumende kanye neluhlelo lwemisebenti yahulumende kuyachubeka nekuba siphephelo lesinemandla salabaphuyile kanye nelusha.
xho: inkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatysiweyo kunye nenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu isaqhubekeka ukuyinciphisa ngokuvakalayo intswela-ngqesho kwabahluphekileyo nolutsha.

ssw: sakhe ematfuba emisebenti letigidzi leti-3.7 kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
xho: sidale amathuba emisebenzi engaphezulu kwe-3, 7 sezigidi kule minyaka mihlanu idlulieyo.

ssw: bantfu betfu batfola imali lengenako nemakhono eluhlelweni lwetemisebenti yahulumende, labawasebentisela kutfola kucashwa lokuhlelekile.
xho: abantu bethu bafumana ingeniso nezakhono kwinkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu, abathi bazisebenzise ekufuneni imisebenzi esesikweni.

ssw: ikhabhinethi itibekele umgomo wekusungula ematfuba emisebenti letigidzi letisitfupha kusukela kulomnyaka kuye ku-2019, kucondvwe lusha.
xho: ikhabhinethi izimisele umlinganiselo wokudala amathuba emisebenzi ezizigidi ezisithandathu ukususela kulo nyaka ukuya kowama-2019, apho kuza kugxilwa kulutsha.

ssw: luhlelo lwetfu lwekusita kutenhlalo manje lolufinyelela kubantfu labatigidzi leti-16, luniketa tekuphepha kubantfu labatigidzi, ikakhulu bantfwana labasengotini.
xho: inkqubo yesibonelelo sethu sezentlalo esifikelela kubantu abamalunga nezigidi ezili-16, inika ukhuselo kwizigidi, ingakumbi abantwana abasemngciphekweni.

ssw: imiti leminyenti itfola kusitakala ngenca yetibonelelo tahulumende, imali yebantfwana, impesheni yalabadzala neyalabakhubatekile.
xho: imizi emininzi iyancedakala ngenxa yezibonelelo zikarhulumente, inkxaso-mali yabantwana, indodla yabadala neyabakhubazekileyo.

ssw: letibonelelo titawuchubeka njalo ngoba imiti leminyenti itfola kusitakala ngobe ematfuba emisebenti ayimvelalakancane ngalesikhatsi semnotfo lobutsakatsaka.
xho: ezi zibonelelo zizokuhlala ziqhubekeka kuba ziluncedo kwimizi emininzi kuba amathuba emisebenzi avela kancinci kweli xesha lokudodobala koqoqosho.

ssw: lamatfuba latfolakala kuhulumende, enta kutsi sisho ngekutigcabha sitsi, iningizimu afrika lesiphila kuyo lamuhla, incono kakhulu kunaleyo besiphila kuyo ngembi kwa-1994.
xho: la mathuba afumanekayo kurhulumente, asenza ukuba sitsho ngeqhayiya ukuthi, umzantsi afrika esiphila kuwo namhlanje, ungcono kakhulu kunalowo sasiphila kuwo ngaphambi kowe-1994.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi,sisesikhatsini lesimatima.
xho: bantu bakuthi,sisekwixesha elinzima.

ssw: tintfo letenteka emnotfweni wasemelika setiholele ekuweni kwetimakethe tetimali lebetisavela, kufaka ekhatsi lirandi.
xho: iimeko zoqoqosho lwasemelika zikhokelele ekuhleni ngamandla kwemali yorwebo lwamazwe asakhulayo, kuquka nerandi.

ssw: nga-2013, lirandi lehle nga-17,6 wemaphesenthi nalicatsaniswa nelidola lasemelika.
xho: ngexesha lowama-2013, irandi yehla nge-17,6 leepesenti xa ithelekiswa nedola yasemelika.

ssw: silinangisonani sekuntjintjiselana siveta ingoti lenkhulu yekwehla nekwenyuka kwentsengo.
xho: izinga lokurwebiselana elibuthathaka liqulathe umngcipheko omkhulu kumandla erandi kwaye kuza kwenza nenkqubo yethu yeziseko ezingundoqo ibize kakhulu.

ssw: nanoma kunjalo, tinkampani letitfumela imphahla ngaphandle kulamanye emave, ikakhulu umkhakha lokhicitako, kufanele tisebentise lelitfuba lekwehla kwemandla elirandi kanye nekuvuka lokunemandla emaveni emhlaba.
xho: noxa kunjalo, iinkampani ezithumela imveliso yazo kumazwe angaphesheya, ingakumbi kwicandelo lokuvelisa, kufanele zibusebenzisele ukuzinceda ubuthathaka berandi nokuphucuka koqoqosho ngamandla ehlabathini jikelele.

ssw: njengoba sisenaletinselele, siyati kutsi singamelana nalesikhatsi sebumatima.
xho: ngeli xesha sinezinzima, siyayiqonda into yokuba singamelana nalo eli xesha lokungazinzi.

ssw: sente njalo phambilini kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
xho: sasikwenzile oko ngaphambili kule minyaka mihlanu igqithileyo.

ssw: sitawuvuka, ecinisweni, sitawuvuka sinemandla kunaphambilini nasingenta tintfo letifanele.
xho: phofu, siza kukulalisa ngophothe ukuba ngaba senza okufanelekileyo.

ssw: sifanele sisebentisane singuhulumende, temabhizinisi netisebenti kute sikhulise umnotfo wetfu ngesilinganiso lesingetulu kwemaphesenti lasihlanu kute kutsi sikhone kwakha imisebenti lesiyidzingako.
xho: kufanele sisebenzisane njengorhulumente, abezoshishino nemibutho yabasebenzi ukukhulisa uqoqosho lwethu ngezinga elingaphezulu kweepesenti ezihlanu sikwazi ukudala amathuba emisebenzi esiyidingayo.

ssw: ngenhlanhla lenhle lokusebentisana sekuvele kuyenteka.
xho: ngethamsanqa le ntsebenziswano seyiqalisile.

ssw: kwenteka ku-nedlac lekungulesinye setikhungo letibalulekile tekusebentisana kuntsandvo yetfu yelinyenti, emkhatsini wahulumende, temabhizinisi, tisebenti kanye nemkhakha wemmango.
xho: oko kwenzeka kwibhunga lesizwe lokuphuhlisa uqoqosho nezabasebenzi (i-nedlac) elingamanye wamaziko entsebenziswano kulawulo lwethu lwentando yesininzi, phakathi kukarhulumente, abezoshishino, imibutho emele abasebenzi nabameli babahlali.

ssw: kwenteke ngisho nasekukhulumisaneni lebesiba nako nemmango wetemabhizinisi.
xho: iqhubekekile kwakunye nakuthethathethwano ebesinalo nabezoshishino.

ssw: kulomnyaka lophelile ngicale kubandzakanya temabhizinisi etinyatselweni letitsite hulumende langatitsatsa kute kube lula kuchuba emabhizinisi kulelive lakitsi.
xho: kulo nyaka uphelileyo ndiye ndathethathethana nabezoshishino ngamanyathelo athile anokuthathwa ngurhulumente ukwenza kube lula ngakumbi ukwenza ushishino kweli lizwe lethu.

ssw: lokwavela kuleyo nchubo kutsi manje, sesente kuvunywa kwekulawula nekuniketa emalayisensi ekuhlola lifutse letesimondzawo, emalayisensi emanti newasemayini kusebente kahle kakhulu nangemphumelelo.
xho: okuye kwavela kulo nkqubo, sikuhlengahlengisile ukuphunyezwa kwemithetho nokwenziwa kwempepha-mvume kuhlolo lwempembelelo kwindalo, ukukhutshwa kwempepha-mvume yamanzi nempepha-mvume yimigodi.

ssw: iphalamende isaphotfula tichibiyelo temtsetfo lotawunika emandla lentfuntfuko lenhle, kutawenteka ngaphansi kwemalanga lange-300, sikhatsi lesitsatfwako nakucalwa imayini, kusukela nakufakwa sicelo kudzimate kube sekuvunyweni kwekugcina.
xho: ipalamente iqukumbela izihlomelo kulo mthetho ukwenzela ukuba la manyathelo athembisayo asebenze, into ke leyo ezakucutha iintsuku ezithathwayo ukuvula umgodi, zibe ngaphantsi kwezingama-300, ukususela ekufakweni kwesicelo ukuya ekuphunyezweni kwaso.

ssw: lisekela lamengameli weriphabhulikhi liyachubeka nekuchuba tingcoco emkhatsini wahulumende, tinkampani tetimayini kanye netisebenti.
xho: usekela mongameli werhiphabliki usaqhubekeka ukuququzelela iingxoxo phakathi kukarhulumente, iinkampani zemigodi nemibutho emele abasebenzi.

ssw: inhloso yaloku kusimamisa tebudlelwane kutetimboni kulomkhakha lobalulekile wetemnotfo wetfu.
xho: iinjongo zezokuzinzisa ubudlelwane kweli candelo libaluleke kangaka loqoqosho lwethu.

ssw: lenchubo ikhipha imiphumela.
xho: le nkqubo ivelisa iziphumo noko.

ssw: titeleka kulomnyaka lophelile kulomkhakha tibe mbalwa futsi taba tesikhatsi lesincane.
xho: zibe mbalwa nazifutshane izehlo zoqhankqalazo kweli candelo kulo nyaka uphelileyo.

ssw: futsi lokubaluleke kakhulu kutsi, tinchubo tetetimboni tenteka ngekuhambisana nemtsetfo ngalokungagucuki.
xho: kwaye okona kubaluleke kakhulu, iinkqubo zobudlelwane kwezoshishino ziqhuba ngendlela engqinelanayo nomthetho.

ssw: siye sangenelela kutetimayini ngobe ngutona letibaluleke kakhulu ekwakheni ematfuba emisebenti.
xho: singenelele kwezemigodi kuba ingamanye amacandelo wethu angundoqo ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi.

ssw: sidzinga umkhakha wetimayini losebentako.
xho: sidinga icandelo lezemigodi elisebenzayo.

ssw: timayini ticasha bantfu labangetulu kwahhafu wesigidzi.
xho: imigodi iqesha abantu abangaphezulu kwesiqingatha sesigidi.

ssw: ngutona letingumkhakha lomkhulu wemali lengenako levela emaveni angaphandle kulelive letfu.
xho: lilelona lizuza ingeniso enkulu kunaniselwano namazwe angaphandle kwilizwe lethu.

ssw: tibuye futsi tifake tigidzigidzi letinge-20 temarandi letingena ngco kumalingena yentsela.
xho: ikwa negalelo elimalunga nama-r20 eebhiliyoni eliya ngqo kwingeniso yerhafu.

ssw: tetimayini tibuye futsi kube ngito letifaka sandla kakhulu njengemtsengi wemphahla netinsita, kanye nemfakigalelo kuleminye imikhakha yemnotfo wetfu naleminye iminotfo emhlabeni jikelele.
xho: imigodi yenza igalelo elikhulu kakhulu njengomthengi wezinto ngeenkonzo, kunye nomboneleli wegalelo kwamanye amacandelo oqoqosho lwethu kunye noqoqosho lwamanye amazwe ehlabathini jikelele.

ssw: sihlola kubambisana nalabatsintsekako kute kubukwe ludzaba lwetindlu tekuhlala emadolobheni lanetimayini.
xho: sisaqwalasela ubudlelwane bokuhlangabezana nomba wezindlu kwidolophu ezikufutshane nemigodi nabadlala indima ebalulekileyo.

ssw: akengiphindze futsi ngikhumbute tinkampani tetimbiwa kutsi 2014 ngumncamulajucu wato wekutfutfukisa tetindlu netimo tekuhlala tebavukuti kanye nekuzuza lokunyeti lokuhlosiwe.
xho: mandikhumbuze iinkampani zemigodi ukuba unyaka wama-2014 ngowokugqibela wokuba mabaphucule izindlu neemeko abasebenzi-mgodini abaphila phansi kwazo nokuphumeza inani lwezinto ekufanele ziphunyeziwe.

ssw: hulumende uyachubeka nekulandzelela nekuphocelela kuhambisana kuko kokubili tinhlelo tetenhlalo netetisebenti tetimayini kanye nalokuhloswe yishatha yetimayini.
xho: urhulumente uza kuqhubekeka ukuhlola nokunyanzelisa ukuthotyelwa kuzo zimbini izimiselo zezicwangciso zezentlalo nezabasebenzi nomqulu wezemigodi.

ssw: bantfu bakitsi baseningizimu afrika,malunga lahloniphekile,ngaphandle kwetetimayini, sibuye satfola lokunye lokusihlanu lobekukhicita imisebenti nga-2009.
xho: bemi bomzantsi afrika,malungu ahloniphekileyo,ngaphandle nje kwemigodi, siye sabona amanye amacandelo amahlanu angabadali bamathuba emisebenzi ngowama-2009.

ssw: loku bekutekuvakasha, tekulima, temnotfo letinganukubeti simondzawo nemvelo, kutfutfukiswa kwetakhiwonchanti netekukhicita.
xho: lawo ke zezokhenketho, ezolimo, uqoqosho lokusingqongileyo, iziseko ezingundoqo nelezemveliso.

ssw: imboni yetekuvakasha seyikhule ngemandla.
xho: ishishini lezokhenketho likhule ngokuncomekayo.

ssw: nga-1993 iningizimu afrika yatfola tivakashi tangaphandle letitigidzi letintsatfu.
xho: ngowe-1993, umzantsi afrika ufumene nje izigidi ezintathu zeendwendwe ezisuka kumazwe angaphesheya.

ssw: nga-2012 lelinani lakhula laba tivakashi letitigidzi leti-13.
xho: ngowama-2012, inani likhule lade lafika kwiindwendwe ezizigidi ezili-13.

ssw: sitawuchubeka nekukhulisa lemboni, ngenca yekukhona kwakha imisebenti.
xho: siza kuqhubekeka ukulikhulisa eli shishini, xa siqwalasele amandla walo okudala amathuba emisebenzi.

ssw: nga-2012 sitfule luhlelo lwetakhiwonchanti lwavelonkhe, loluholwa yikhomishini yekucondziswa kwesakhiwonchanti yelihhovisi lamengameli.
xho: ngowama-2012 sityhile isicwangciso seziseko ezingundoqo sesizwe, ngokukhokelwa ngumongameli ngekhomishini kamongameli yokulungelelanisa iziseko ezingundoqo.

ssw: ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi sikhone kutjala sigidzigidzi sinye lesiphindvwe katsatfu kutakhiwonchanti temmango kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
xho: emva koko sityale itriliyoni enye yeerandi kwiziseko ezingundoqo zoluntu kule minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo.

ssw: leminyenti yalemiklamo seyiphotfuliwe noma seyidvute kuphotfulwa.
xho: uninzi lweziprojekthi zigqityiwe okanye seziza kugqitywa.

ssw: ngitawubala nje lembalwa.
xho: ndiza kukhankanya nje zibe mbalwa.

ssw: luhlelo lwemabhasi latfutsa aphindzelela i-rea vaya ejozi manje lusetjentiswa bahlali basegauteng labangetulu kwaba-100 000. tinhlelo letifana nalolu tiyakhiwa ekapa, etshwane, enelson mandela bay, ebuffalo city, ethekwini naserustenburg.
xho: inkqubo ye-rea vaya yaserhawutini ngoku isetyenziswa ngabahlali basegauteng abangaphezulu kwe-100 000. inkqubo ekwanjalo isakhiwa ekapa, etshwane, enelson mandela bay, kwisixeko sase-buffalo, ethekwini nase-rustenburg.

ssw: lugu lolusikhumulo semikhumbi selwentiwe lwaba ncono.
xho: amazibuko needolophu ezinamazibuko zeli lizwe ziphuculiwe.

ssw: sesakhe liphayiphi lekuhambisa emafutsa lelingemakhilomitha lasikhombisa lelisuka ethekwini liya egauteng kute litfutse tigidzigidzi letine temakhiyubhikhi emalitha aphethiloli, dizili naphethiloli wetindizamshini ngemnyaka.
xho: sifakele uluhlu lwemibhobho yezibaso engama-700 eekhilomitha ukusuka ethekwini ukuya egauteng yokuthutha iibhiliyoni ezine zeekyubhik-litha zepetula, idizili kunye nezibaso zejeti ngonyaka.

ssw: sekwakhiwe imigwaco lemisha noma imizila lecishe ifike kumakhilomitha layi-1500.
xho: sekwakhiwe iindlela ezintsha okanye imizila ephantse yafika kwi-1500 leekhilomitha.

ssw: lenchubekelembili mayelana nemigwaco isikhumbuta labo labasebentele lohulumende phambilini labebafunela lelive lokuphuma embili, njengendvuna yetetitfutsi yaphambilini, umnu.
xho: le nkqubela ngokumalunga neendlela isikhumbuzo ngabo babesebenza kulo rhulumente ngaphambi kwethu ababefuna ukuba eli lizwe lifumane okungcono kodwa, abafana nowayesakuba ngumphathiswa wezothutho umnu dullar omar.

ssw: umkakhe lotsandzekako farieda ungulomunye wetivakashi tetfu lamuhla kusihlwa.
xho: inkosikazi yakhe ufarieda ngomnye weendwendwe zethu ezibalulekileyo ngobu busuku.

ssw: kwakhiwa kwemizila lemisha yesitimela sekucalile empumalanga, kute kunciphise kugcwala kwetitfutsi emigwacweni.
xho: ukwakhiwa komzila woololiwe empumalanga sekuqalile, ngeenjongo zokunciphisa uxinizelelo ezindleleni.

ssw: umklamo wegautrain manje usebenta ngalokuphelele futsi itfwala bagibeli labangetulu kwetigidzi leti-1,2 ngenyanga.
xho: iprojekthi yegautrain isebenza ngokupheleleyo ngoku kwaye ithwala abakhweli abangaphezulu kwe-1,2 sezigidi ngenyanga.

ssw: sikhungo sekutfwala bagibeli ngaloliwe saseningizimu afrika sitawusebentisa ngetulu kwetigidzigidzi leti-120 temarandi kuleminyaka lelishumi letako kutsenga titimela letinsha.
xho: i-arhente yabakhweli bakaloliwe yasemzantsi afrika (i-prasa) iza kuchitha ngaphezulu kwe-r120 leebhiliyoni kule minyaka ilishumi izayo ukuthenga oololiwe abatsha.

ssw: i-transnet yetfula indlelalisu yayo lenkhulu yaloko lokudzingwa yimakethe lebita tigidzidzi temarandi letinge-300, yekwakha sakhiwonchanti setitfutsi lesidzingeka kakhulu.
xho: abakwa-transnet baphumeza isicwangciso-qhinga sabo esifunekayo sama-r300 eebhiliyoni, ngokwakha iziseko ezingundoqo zezothutho ezidingeka ngamandla.

ssw: kute sitfole emandla etemnotfo lokhona enshonalanga kapa naselugwini lwasenshonalanga, setfule indzawo yekutfutfukisa timboni esaldanha sabuye futsi savula timboni letimbili letinsha e-atlantis.
xho: ngokuqonda amandla wezoqoqosho wentshona koloni nonxweme lwasentshona, simisele ummandla wophuhliso lwamashishini i-saldanha saze savula nemizi-mveliso emibini emitsha e-atlantis.

ssw: kute kwentiwe ncono kuphakelwa kwemanti, kuphotfulwe kwakhiwa kwemadamu lamakhulu lamabili, i-de hoop elimpopo kanye ne-spring grove kwazulu-natal, bese kutsi umlente wesibili wemklamo i-lesotho highlands water wetfulwe madvute nje.
xho: ukuphucula ubonelelo lwamanzi, sele egqityiwe ukwakhiwa amadama amabini amatsha, i-de hoop elimpopo ne-spring grove kwazulu-natal, ngeli xesha isigaba sesibini seprojekthi ilesotho highlands water iza kumiselwa kungekudala.

ssw: kwakha kuyachubeka esiteshini lesisha sekuphehla gezi, i-medupi elimpopo, i-kusile empumalanga ne-ingula dvutane naseladysmith, kucashwe tisebenti letingetulu kwe-300 000. siyachubeka nekufuna leminye imitfombo yemandla, ngekuhambisana neluhlelo loluhlanganisile lwemtfombo wemandlakutfutfukiswa kwemafutsa i-petroleum, ikakhulu gesi wetinhlese (shale) kutawuba nguyonantfo legucula indlela besisolomane senta ngayo tintfo esigodzini sasekaroo kanye nakumnotfo waseningizimu afrika .
xho: ulwakhiwo lwezikhululo zombane ezitsha ezibini lusaqhubekeka, imedupi elimpopo, ikusile empumalanga ne-ingula kufutshane nomnambithi, kwaqeshwa abasebenzi abangaphezulu kwama-30 000. sisaqhubekeka ukuphonononga eminye imithombo yezamandla, ngokuhambelana nesicwangciso semithombo edibeneyo yezamandla.

ssw: ngemuva kwekuhlola tingoti nematfuba, umtsetfosimiso wekugcina utawetfulwa madvute nje futsi utawulandzelwa ekucutjungulweni nasekukhishweni kwemalayisensi.
xho: ukuphuhliswa kwepetroliyam, ingakumbi igesi ephuma kuqhushumbo olwenzeka phantsi komhlaba kungaguqula izinto kummandla wekaroo noqoqosho lwasemzantsi afrika.

ssw: silindzele kuphetsa kutfolwa kwemamegawatsi latinkhulungwane letiyimfica nemakhulu lasitfupha emandla enuzi.
xho: siyihlolile imingcipheko namathuba, imithetho yokugqibela iza kuqukunjelwa kungekudala ize ilandelwe ngokwenziwa nokukhutshwa kweempepha-mvume.

ssw: emafutsa lakhiwa ngetitjalo akhetsiwe futsi asacalile kusebenta.
xho: abavelisi bezibaso ezivela kwizityalo sele bekhethiwe kwaye sele beqalisile ukusebenza.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekilekwetfu nje, live lelisebenta mbamba futsi seliyindzawo lencono kakhulu yekuhlala.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyoeneneni elethu lilizwe elisebenzayo kwaye yindawo ekungconwanana ukuhlala kuyo.

ssw: sifanele kutsi singaphelelwa ngulomfutfo.
xho: kufuneka silugcine olo yondelelwano lwamandla.

ssw: malunga lahloniphekile,umnotfo wetfu lomunye lomnyenti wakheka ku-inthanethi noma ngetekuchumanisana.
xho: malungu ahloniphekileyo,uninzi lobutyebi bethu budalwa ngokusebenzisa i-intanethi okanye unxibelelwano lomnxeba.

ssw: intsambo yagezi lenemicu leminyenti lebudze lobungemakhilomitha lange-37 000 ifakwe ngumkhakha wangasese kanye newesive kuleminyaka lesihlanu leyengcile.
xho: kule minyaka mihlanu idlulileyo kufakelwe iintambo zombane ezinezigqubuthelo zeplastiki ezingama-37 000 eekhilomitha.

ssw: loku kutawukhuliswa kakhulu kuleminyaka letako.
xho: oko kuza kwandiswa ngokuvakalayo kule minyaka siya kuyo.

ssw: siyatigcabha ngemiphumela yetfu kutesayensi nebucwepheshe.
